programme.desc: Peppa goes to Buckingham Palace, where Miss Rabbit is set to win an award, in a special episode produced to celebrate the Queen's Diamond Jubilee.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Grandpa Pig and Grampy Rabbit get stranded on an island after a fishing trip goes wrong, so Daddy Dog sets out to rescue them.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Ritchie the ostrich has lost his sister. She is too small to see over the long grass in Ritchie's world, so Wissper summons Herbert the shire horse so she can ride on his back.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The duo play with a wheelbarrow that has a wonky wheel, but everybody else soon wants a turn.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Journalist and broadcaster Matthew Wright is joined by a panel of guests and the studio audience to debate the issues of the day.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: The doctors treat a series of patients with broken bones and open wounds, including a man involved in a motorcycle accident just three days earlier, and a woman with an abscess on her upper leg and groin. The doctors also deal with Gary, who underwent facial surgery to remove a cancerous tumour from his jaw.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Can't Pay? We'll Take It Away
programme.desc: The agents chase £4,500 owed to a shipping company by a car parts dealer in Lancashire, but when the debtor arrives, he tries to assault one of the officers. Max and Steve are in east London on a mission to collect over £2,000 owed to a housing association, and Paul and Ben are in north London where they attempt to evict two tenants who owe more than £7,000 in rent arrears.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Everyone pitches in to help with Matt and Evelyn's wedding, while John realises that he cannot take Marilyn away from her friends and Zac admits to Leah that he slept with Sam.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly witnesses an intimate moment between Paige and Mark, but Paige later denies any romantic interest. Gary's involvement with Brooke jeopardises his relationship with Terese.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Navy Public Affairs Officer is killed, and when the team takes up the case, both the man's wife and his mistress emerge as potential suspects. Each woman offering a very different take on the chain of events that led to the murder, and the investigators are forced to decide which of the two is telling the truth. Meanwhile, DiNozzo's father comes to the aid of a homeless woman, who makes a surprising claim about his relationship with her. Guest starring Robert Wagner.(n)

programme.title: Dark Secrets
programme.desc: A young woman becomes increasingly suspicious of the motives of her older room-mate. Thriller, starring Boti Bliss, Ashley Leggat and William R Moses. Edited for daytime broadcast.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Elly witnesses an intimate moment between Paige and Mark, but Paige later denies any romantic interest. Gary's involvement with Brooke jeopardises his relationship with Terese.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Everyone pitches in to help with Matt and Evelyn's wedding, while John realises that he cannot take Marilyn away from her friends and Zac admits to Leah that he slept with Sam.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: An election broadcast by one of the political parties.(n)

programme.title: MotoGP Highlights
programme.desc: The Spanish Grand Prix. Action from the fourth round of the season, which was held at Circuito de Jerez in Andalusia. Veteran Valentino Rossi moved to the top of the standings after his second place behind Marc Marquez in the last round in Texas, but his Yamaha team-mate Maverick Vinales, who won the first two races of the season, was still just six points behind.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dog handler Bob hunts down a suspected knifeman, while interceptors Jon and Chris are on the trail of some suspected armed robbers. Meanwhile, Sergeant John wrestles with a drunken reveller, and a tattoo provides a clue that leads Jim to a major drugs bust.(n)

programme.title: Inside the Gang
programme.desc: New series. Documentary examining British gang culture, revealing how drugs, criminal activity and violence have become part of members' everyday lives. The first episode focuses on the younger adherents of British street gangs, revealing how they are used by the older ones to sell drugs and carry out violent attacks on their behalf, lured by the idea of money, girls and cars.(n)

programme.title: Mind the Age Gap
programme.desc: New series. With society apparently more divided than ever, 12 volunteers from different generations attempt to bridge the gap by moving into a house together, where they are encouraged to talk about some of the most important issues that affect the world today. An attempt to get to know one another triggers uncomfortable debates revealing controversial opinions from the older generation. Tension is in the air, and gay marriage is the first topic that divides old from young. And while the older guests are keen to debate, the younger ones see an opportunity to party.(n)

programme.title: Parker
programme.desc: A thief is betrayed and left for dead by his partners in crime. He learns they are planning a diamond heist in a wealthy neighbourhood, so poses as a millionaire wanting to buy a house in the area. A real-estate agent sees through the disguise and helps him get even by stealing the gems from his traitorous gang. Action thriller, with Jason Statham and Jennifer Lopez.(n)

programme.title: SuperCasino
programme.desc: Viewers get the chance to take part in live interactive gaming, with an entertaining mix of roulette-wheel spins and lively chat from the presenting team. Featuring a variety of prizes and promotions.(n)

programme.title: Top 20 Funniest
programme.desc: Humorous video clips include a baby imitating her father's screams and a mother and daughter refusing the man in their lives any affection.(n)

programme.title: Get Your Tatts Out: Kavos Ink
programme.desc: Three strip-club workers have a contest to drum up more business, with the loser having a mammary-based reminder of his failure sketched onto his leg. Holiday-maker Nelson has his pals' names inked on his backside, while another comes up with a design representing his favourite body part.(n)

programme.title: House Doctor
programme.desc: Ann Maurice advises a basement flat owner who is unable to find a buyer for her home in Stoke Newington, north London. Sweeping out the mishmash of styles and loud colours, she introduces a calmer range of warm neutral shades, unifying the interior by laying laminate flooring and creating a separate dining area.(n)

programme.title: HouseBusters
programme.desc: Janet Ellis meets a homeowner who feels trapped in her property, and has seen various attempts to sell it fall through. She receives advice from a feng shui expert, who claims she is too fixated on the past, a `home healer', who diagnoses low energy levels in the property, and a mystic who announces that the tree outside her bedroom window has to go.(n)

programme.title: Wildlife SOS
programme.desc: The work of volunteers treating sick, injured and orphaned animals at a wildlife sanctuary.(n)

programme.title: Lily's Driftwood Bay
programme.desc: Lily finds a little hoop washed up on the beach, which is just perfect for the Driftwood Bay Carnival. Lily and Bull decide to see how many prizes they can win.(n)

programme.title: Mofy
programme.desc: Kerry's birthday arrives, but he thinks that nobody has remembered.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Daddy Pig's car runs out of petrol, leaving him stranded.(n)

programme.title: Little Princess
programme.sub-title: I Don't Want to Miss It.
programme.desc: The youngster is unhappy because she keeps missing all the exciting things happening around the castle.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Turbot is walking a tightrope, only for seagulls to threaten his act - and when he is left dangling, the Paw Patrol race to the rescue.(n)

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: The team plans a birthday surprise at the garage for Curtis, but trouble arises when Scoop tries to be a mechanic.(n)

programme.title: Fireman Sam
programme.desc: Norman forgets to apply some important screws when building a treehouse. When he climbs inside, it begins to topple to one side and the firefighters are called in to help.(n)

programme.title: Thomas & Friends
programme.desc: When Salty has to travel by ship to the mainland, all the tall stories about sea monsters that he loves to make up begin to make him uneasy.(n)

programme.title: Milkshake! Monkey
programme.desc: The inquisitive puppet visits Cornwall, where the local shop has run out of ice-cream - so Milkshake Monkey learns how to make more.(n)

programme.title: Shimmer and Shine
programme.desc: The girls bake magical flying cookies, but Zeta and her pet dragon sneak in to steal the flying flour.(n)

programme.title: Noddy: Toyland Detective
programme.sub-title: Noddy and the Case of the Missing Music Player.
programme.desc: The little wooden boy wonders who has taken his music player, which he needs to accompany tonight's dance party.(n)

programme.title: Paw Patrol
programme.desc: Mayor Humdinger swipes the PAW Patroller to watch his favourite TV show, but the pups need to get it back.(n)

programme.title: Ben and Holly's Little Kingdom
programme.desc: Redbeard the Elf Pirate sets sail to find a lost city, but soon finds himself in trouble and in need of rescuing.(n)

programme.title: Digby Dragon
programme.desc: When Digby tells his friends that they need to go to Peek Rock to see a special event, Grizel and Mungo decide that they have to get there first.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: Inspired by Granny Pig's perfume, the piglet experiments with the flowers in her garden to make her own scent.(n)

programme.title: Peppa Pig
programme.desc: The friends try to raise money to fix the school's leaky roof by organising a fete.(n)

programme.title: Wissper
programme.desc: Monty the meerkat wants to be a lookout for his colony, but he is hopeless at standing still.(n)

programme.title: Wanda and the Alien
programme.desc: The friends go back to Alien's home planet for Game Day, where everyone spends the day playing.(n)

programme.title: The Wright Stuff
programme.desc: Matthew Wright and guests talk about the issues of the day, with viewers calling in to offer their opinions.(n)

programme.title: GPs: Behind Closed Doors
programme.desc: A young man visits the surgery after coughing up blood, but the doctors soon realise this began when he started smoking cannabis to deal with loneliness, and suggest alternative therapies. Later, the doctors deal with an older lady suffering from frequent headaches, and a young child with chickenpox. Last in the series.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Lunchtime
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: On Benefits
programme.desc: The documentary focuses on the experiences of welfare claimants in relationships. They include Essex couple Suzanne and Derek, who are looking to move to avoid paying bedroom tax on their four-bedroom home. But finding a property to meet Suzanne's exacting standards is proving tricky. Meanwhile, epilepsy sufferer Stephan and his wife Linda are deep in debt but still spend £12 a week feeding the homeless, and Carl and Angie's benefits are affected by his disability allowance and her wages from a part-time job.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Evie, Matt and Ellie say their goodbyes and John visits the caravan park in an attempt to make amends to the victims of the fire he started.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Mark asks questions of Yashvi - and is astonished by the answers. Paige turns to Mark for support after she receives some news from the hospital.(n)

programme.title: NCIS: Los Angeles
programme.desc: The FBI's domestic terrorist task force, including operational psychologist Nate Getz, steps in to help the team when a former marine is suspected of creating a chemical bomb. Crime drama, starring Peter Cambor and Chris O'Donnell.(n)

programme.title: Bone to Pick: Teagarden Mystery
programme.desc: Librarian sleuth Aurora Teagarden inherits a house when her friend unexpectedly dies and discovers her new home has a skull hidden in a window seat. She sets out to discover who the victim was, but finds herself thrown into a troubling murder mystery and a street full of suspicious neighbours. Mystery, starring Candace Cameron Bure, Peter Benson and Dave Collette.(n)

programme.title: 5 News at 5
programme.desc: Round-up of the day's headlines from around the world.(n)

programme.title: Neighbours
programme.desc: Mark asks questions of Yashvi - and is astonished by the answers. Paige turns to Mark for support after she receives some news from the hospital.(n)

programme.title: Home and Away
programme.desc: Evie, Matt and Ellie say their goodbyes and John visits the caravan park in an attempt to make amends to the victims of the fire he started.(n)

programme.title: 5 News Tonight
programme.desc: A round-up of the evening's headlines, including coverage of the latest national and international stories.(n)

programme.title: Party Election Broadcast
programme.desc: An election broadcast by one of the political parties.(n)

programme.title: Police Interceptors
programme.desc: Dog handler Bob hunts down a suspected knifeman, while interceptors Jon and Chris are on the trail of some suspected armed robbers. Meanwhile, Sergeant John wrestles with a drunken reveller, and a tattoo provides a clue that leads Jim to a major drugs bust.(n)

programme.title: The Yorkshire Vet
programme.desc: Julian Norton has a large lump to remove from between a Highland cow's horns, then must find out why an event horse has broken out in bumps from head to hoof. Meanwhile, Peter Wright helps a ewe deliver her first lambs and treats a micro-pig who has outgrown his house and is under the weather.(n)

programme.title: Elizabeth
programme.sub-title: Elizabeth I: Battle for the Throne.
programme.desc: New series. Drama-documentary about the life of Elizabeth I, featuring reconstructions of key moments in her reign starring Lily Cole as the queen. The first episode focuses on her teenage years, which she spent banished from the royal court as siblings Edward and Mary came to the throne in turn. The programme explores how an ambitious nobleman plotted to use her to seize the throne for himself, and how she faced execution at her sister's order before her coronation in 1558.(n)

programme.title: Mind the Age Gap
programme.desc: The cross-generational volunteers continue to live together and debate the key issues that affect the world today. Most of the residents have found their feet, although 27-year-old Naman is feeling isolated, not helped by the others' constant questions about his religion. Single mum Tracy helps octogenarian Dee in her man-quest by enrolling her on Tinder, and the tension between Bob and Ty gets worse.(n)

programme.title: 20 Moments
programme.desc: Countdown of significant performers, songs or occasions that impacted the genre, including 1985's global Live Aid event, which redefined how society donated to charity. Plus, the moment Boy George burst onto TV screens in an explosion of hairstreamers and gender-bending, and the backlash that hit Radio 1 DJ Mike Read when he tried to ban Relax by Frankie Goes to Hollywood. The programme also reflects on Stock Aitken Waterman's 1980s chart supremacy and recalls the time Sam Fox and Mick Fleetwood hosted the Brits.(n)

programme.title: Café para llevar
programme.desc: An engaged woman is finalizing her wedding plans and stops in a café for coffee, where unbeknownst to her is her fiancé(n)

programme.title: Magallanes
programme.desc: A Peruvian taxi driver plans to blackmail a colonel, his former military superior during a conflict against an insurgency, over the latter's kidnapping and sexual abuse of a young girl(n)

programme.title: Point Break
programme.desc: An FBI agent goes undercover and infiltrates a group of extreme athletes in order to prove they are using their specialised skills to pull off a series of complex crimes. The film is inspired by the 1991 cult hit of the same name(n)

programme.title: Fred Claus
programme.desc: Santa's ne'er-do-well older brother wreaks havoc on the holidays when he is forced to work at the North Pole's toy shop(n)

programme.title: Run Fatboy Run
programme.desc: An overweight man leaves his fiancée on their wedding day, only to realize years later that she's the one and only woman of his dreams in a romantic comedy that reunites Big Nothing co-stars Simon Pegg and David Schwimmer, this time with Schimmer in the director's chair. It's not easy to win back a woman after leaving her at the altar, but when an out-of-shape man finally realizes just what a mistake he's made, he vows to run a high-profile marathon in order to convince his ex-fiancée that the rich and handsome man she's about to marry isn't the guy for her(n)

programme.title: I Love You, Man
programme.desc: A hapless chap who doesn't have any male friends to serve as best man at his wedding meets a freewheeling fun-loving guy who just might fill the bill, but their chummy, male-bonding camaraderie just might impact his relationship with his bride-to-be(n)

programme.title: Scarface
programme.desc: Graphically violent story of a Miami-based mob boss - a Cuban refugee who works his way through gangland competition and builds up a nationwide drug-trafficking empire which then collapses around him. Oliver Stone's screenplay was adapted from Ben Hecht's script for the original 1932 version of the film starring Paul Muni(n)

programme.title: Mission: Impossible II
programme.desc: Action maestro John Woo directed this sensational sequel starring Tom Cruise as IMF agent Ethan Hunt. Hunt partners with Nyah Hall (Thandie Newton) to hunt down her ex-lover, a renegade spy who has stolen a deadly high-tech virus. Dougray Scott, Ving Rhames, Richard Roxburgh, John Polson, Brendan Gleeson(n)

programme.title: Our Brand Is Crisis
programme.desc: A female political consultant is hired to work on the campaign of a Bolivian presidential candidate who has fallen behind in the polls. She faces off against her rival, who is working on the opponent's campaign and is looking for every opportunity to antagonize her(n)

programme.title: The Sum of All Fears
programme.desc: CIA operative Jack Ryan hunts neo-Nazi terrorists, who plan to detonate a nuclear weapon in the U.S. An uneven adaptation of the Tom Clancy thriller. In Clancy's novel, the terrorists were Islamic extremists(n)

programme.title: Black Mass
programme.desc: This riveting crime drama based on true events follows the rise and fall of South Boston gangster James "Whitey" Bulger, who was convinced by an FBI agent to act as an informant against the Italian mob. With his main competition out of the way, Bulger assumes power and becomes a feared crime boss(n)

programme.title: Body of Lies
programme.desc: Powerhouse performances by Leonardo DiCaprio and Russell Crowe ignite this charged international-espionage thriller. DiCaprio's a dedicated CIA field operative in Jordan on the trail of a terrorist, and Crowe is a manipulative stateside agent aiding him in his quest. DiCaprio tries to lure the bomber out of hiding, but discovers that the deeper in he gets, the harder it may be to get out alive. Directed by Ridley Scott from a script by William Monahan, who adapted David Ignatius's book(n)

programme.title: 28 Days Later
programme.desc: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary(n)

programme.title: Trespass
programme.desc: Two Arkansas firemen learn from a dying man that he hid a stash of gold in a disused warehouse 50 years earlier in an East St Louis ghetto. When they go in search of the loot, the pair unwittingly observe a murder carried out by the local mob and become targets themselves, especially when it becomes known why they happen to be in the area in the first place(n)

programme.title: The Aviator
programme.desc: Reteaming the director and star of Gangs of New York, Martin Scorcese's The Aviator stars Leonardo DiCaprio as legendary millionaire Howard Hughes. Focusing on the early part of Hughes' adult life, the film chronicles how he built his fortune, beginning as the proprietor of his late father's tool company, then as a Hollywood producer and the owner of RKO studios, and later as an aviation mogul. Alan Alda, Alec Baldwin, and Kate Beckinsale also star(n)

programme.title: The Express
programme.desc: Rob Brown gives a stellar performance in this winning fact-based sports biopic. He plays Syracuse University running back Ernie Davis, the first African-American to win the Heisman Trophy as the outstanding college-football player in the nation in 1961. Dennis Quaid costars as Syracuse coach Ben Schwartzwalder. Directed by Gary Fleder. The screenplay is by Charles Leavitt, who based it on the book "Ernie Davis: The Elmira Express," written by Syracuse alumnus Robert C. Gallagher(n)

programme.title: Trapped
programme.desc: In this tense thriller, a young girl with asthma is kidnapped and held for ransom, but her captors tell her parents that they'll deprive the child of her medication unless they comply with their terms, one of which is not to contact the police(n)

programme.title: Sea of Love
programme.desc: Jaded cop Frank trawls the lonely hearts column for clues to identify a serial killer preying on lovesick single men. Then he places his own advert, hoping to flush the killer out. Excellent crime thriller(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: (2002) Ben Affleck plays well-heeled lawyer Gavin Banek dashing to a meeting; while Samuel L Jackson takes the role of Doyle Gipson, an estranged husband on his way to a child custody hearing. When the pair's cars collide in a minor accident, Banek dashes off a cheque and leaves, little knowing he's accidentally taken a document crucial to Gipson's hearing that sees him lose the case. But Gipson has an equally vital document belonging to Banek and so begins a battle of wills and wits in Roger Michell's fast-moving thriller(n)

programme.title: Cocktail
programme.desc: Tom Cruise is the ambitious barman who falls for a wealthy beauty, but risks all to win a bet. Glossy, glass-juggling romantic drama with Bryan Brown and Elisabeth Shue(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Piper Perabo stars in this musical romantic romp about a songwriter who tries to make it in Manhattan. When music-business doors slam in her face, she takes a job in a rowdy pub where female bartenders whip the crowd into a frenzy with sexy shenanigans. Maria Bello, Adam Garcia, Izabella Miko, Tyra Banks, Bridget Moynahan(n)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Good Night, and Good Luck director George Clooney pulls double duty once again in this sports-oriented romantic comedy set against the formation of professional football in the 1920s. Dodge Connelly (Clooney) is a brash and handsome gridiron giant who is equally comfortable leading his team in a barroom brawl or charging for a touchdown in a packed stadium. But when Connelly's team loses their sponsor and the entire league appears set to collapse, the quick-thinking jock attempts a creative late-game comeback. If Connelly can convince former college football star and decorated war hero Carter Rutherford (John Krasinski) to join the team, there may be hope for the ill-fated team after all. Back in World War I, Rutherford single-handedly forced the surrender of multiple German soldiers -- a feat that firmly established the dashing young soldier as America's favorite son. Not only that, but Rutherford's unparalleled speed makes him a valuable asset to the team. To cub reporter Lexie Littleton (Renée Zellweger), Rutherford seems simply too good to be true, and she's determined to prove that her theory is correct. As Littleton digs deep into Rutherford's past, the two teammates enter into a fierce competition for her erratic affections. Now, as Connelly's plan begins to work better than he ever could have anticipated, the rowdy sport he always loved starts to take on a whole new look and feel. In the midst of holding his team together and simultaneously charming the girl of his dreams, Connelly discovers he may be able to use the same strategies he does to win on the field to win in love. Of course, there might be a few fouls as this game enters the fourth quarter, but like every good player, Connelly knows the value of always having a secret play to fall back on before the final score is called(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season
programme.desc: In this touching comedy-drama, an alcoholic named Bill (Sam Rockwell) seeks redemption by coaching his daughter's high-school basketball team after his drinking problem squandered a career in the NBA. Directed by James C. Strouse(n)

programme.title: The Forest
programme.desc: A young woman searches for her twin sister in an infamous Japanese forest beneath Mount Fuji where lost souls go to commit suicide. With the help of an American guide, she treks into the heart of the mysterious woodland(n)

programme.title: Minority Report
programme.desc: It's the year 2054, and crime has been eradicated in Washington. Thanks to the foretelling skills of three mutants called Pre-cogs, the future can be predicted and the guilty ones are convicted before committing any offence. These three psychic beings are part of the elitist Pre-Crime unit, within the Department of Justice. For the time being, their predictions have never failed. No one works with more enthusiasm than its boss, John Anderton, who due to a tragic loss dedicates his life to this cutting-edge project. Anderton supports and promotes this perfect system until he becomes the main suspect(n)

programme.title: Café para llevar
programme.desc: An engaged woman is finalizing her wedding plans and stops in a café for coffee, where unbeknownst to her is her fiancé(n)

programme.title: Magallanes
programme.desc: A Peruvian taxi driver plans to blackmail a colonel, his former military superior during a conflict against an insurgency, over the latter's kidnapping and sexual abuse of a young girl(n)

programme.desc: In this tense thriller, a young girl with asthma is kidnapped and held for ransom, but her captors tell her parents that they'll deprive the child of her medication unless they comply with their terms, one of which is not to contact the police(n)

programme.title: Changing Lanes
programme.desc: (2002) Ben Affleck plays well-heeled lawyer Gavin Banek dashing to a meeting; while Samuel L Jackson takes the role of Doyle Gipson, an estranged husband on his way to a child custody hearing. When the pair's cars collide in a minor accident, Banek dashes off a cheque and leaves, little knowing he's accidentally taken a document crucial to Gipson's hearing that sees him lose the case. But Gipson has an equally vital document belonging to Banek and so begins a battle of wills and wits in Roger Michell's fast-moving thriller(n)

programme.title: Coyote Ugly
programme.desc: Piper Perabo stars in this musical romantic romp about a songwriter who tries to make it in Manhattan. When music-business doors slam in her face, she takes a job in a rowdy pub where female bartenders whip the crowd into a frenzy with sexy shenanigans. Maria Bello, Adam Garcia, Izabella Miko, Tyra Banks, Bridget Moynahan(n)

programme.title: Leatherheads
programme.desc: Good Night, and Good Luck director George Clooney pulls double duty once again in this sports-oriented romantic comedy set against the formation of professional football in the 1920s. Dodge Connelly (Clooney) is a brash and handsome gridiron giant who is equally comfortable leading his team in a barroom brawl or charging for a touchdown in a packed stadium. But when Connelly's team loses their sponsor and the entire league appears set to collapse, the quick-thinking jock attempts a creative late-game comeback. If Connelly can convince former college football star and decorated war hero Carter Rutherford (John Krasinski) to join the team, there may be hope for the ill-fated team after all. Back in World War I, Rutherford single-handedly forced the surrender of multiple German soldiers -- a feat that firmly established the dashing young soldier as America's favorite son. Not only that, but Rutherford's unparalleled speed makes him a valuable asset to the team. To cub reporter Lexie Littleton (Renée Zellweger), Rutherford seems simply too good to be true, and she's determined to prove that her theory is correct. As Littleton digs deep into Rutherford's past, the two teammates enter into a fierce competition for her erratic affections. Now, as Connelly's plan begins to work better than he ever could have anticipated, the rowdy sport he always loved starts to take on a whole new look and feel. In the midst of holding his team together and simultaneously charming the girl of his dreams, Connelly discovers he may be able to use the same strategies he does to win on the field to win in love. Of course, there might be a few fouls as this game enters the fourth quarter, but like every good player, Connelly knows the value of always having a secret play to fall back on before the final score is called(n)

programme.title: The Winning Season

programme.channel: Crime and Investigation Network HDTV (CI HD)
programme.title: American Justice
programme.sub-title: Body of Evidence: The Tom Capano Trial
programme.desc: Body of Evidence: The Tom Capano Trial. A&E investigates the deadly consequences of unrequited love in the one-hour American Justice: Body of Evidence -- The Tom Capano Trial. Wealthy and well-connected, Tom Capano was still subjected to the torments of the heart. When an affair with Anne Marie Fahey ended badly, he snapped. After murdering his ex-lover, Capano dumped her body in the water, a seemingly clever move. However, Capano never counted on the guilty conscience of his own brother to secure his undoing. The police kept the jealous boyfriend under surveillance until they had the sibling's confession as accomplice. Surprisingly, at trial, Capano himself admitted to removing the body. But, he held onto the claim that Fahey was killed by someone else. Capano was convicted and sentenced to death(n)

programme.desc: Jake and Amy work together on a case, but wind up arguing over Jake's old, worn-out mattress. Meanwhile, Boyle scratches Holt's prized car, and the teenage boy Rosa sponsors as a `big brother' is in trouble with the law. Comedy, starring Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess is lacking direction after being fired from her teaching job and agrees to act as a `shot girl' at a party thrown by Schmidt. Winston shows a new side to his personality after enjoying some of Nick's elaborate cocktails and Cece introduces the gang to her new boyfriend. Comedy, with Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess encounters a handsome stranger who is waiting to meet a woman he befriended on the internet, so she decides to pretend to be his date. Nick becomes convinced that an old man at the bar is a version of himself who has travelled back in time, while Schmidt tries to woo Winston's sister. Comedy, starring Zooey Deschanel.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon invites a famous physicist to the flat after befriending her online, but is put out to find Leonard showing an interest in her. Meanwhile, Penny has to confront her ex-boyfriend when the visitor turns up in his bedroom. Guest starring Judy Greer (Glenn Martin, DDS).(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The comedy flashes back to reveal how Sheldon saved the lives of his pals, and looks at the origins of his friendship with Leonard seven years previously, as well as explaining the housemates' agreement. Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons star.(n)

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Hunter and Prince are shocked when their dad Shane return, and Tegan gives Nick an ultimatum about their relationship. Elsewhere, Zack's romantic surprise ends in a trip to the hospital when he suffers an allergic reaction.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Penny makes an important decision after Leonard tries to help her in the aftermath of a failed role on a TV show. Meanwhile, Raj and Stuart practise talking to strangers at a shopping centre, and Sheldon studies to become a comic genius. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon tries to relax after he is forced to take a holiday, and when Penny quits her job the duo end up spending time together. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki, Jim Parsons and Kaley Cuoco.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard meets up with the woman he kissed during his trip in the hope of setting Penny's mind at ease, while Sheldon films a special episode of Fun with Flags after his break-up with Amy. Bernadette feels guilty about keeping a secret from Penny.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: The guys' science skills are put to the test when they get a flat tyre during Leonard's surprise bachelor party weekend in Mexico. Meanwhile, the girls finally force Penny to break the news to her family that she has eloped with Leonard. Keith Carradine guest stars.(n)

programme.title: New Girl

programme.desc: Jeff feels threatened by Audrey's salary increase, leading to a power struggle between them. Jen and Adam make the most of the situation when a waiter believes they have just got engaged.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.sub-title: The Last of the Red Hat Lovers.
programme.desc: Russell takes a holiday cruise, believing he will be surrounded by beautiful women, but finds out there are only old ladies on board. Jeff and Audrey stay in his flat while he is away, and soon get into a quarrel that only finishes when Timmy uses CCTV footage to help resolve their disagreement.(n)

programme.title: Charmed

programme.title: Hollyoaks
programme.desc: Darcy makes Adam question whether he should marry Maxine, and Simone is floored when Cindy announces that she is running against her for the local councillor position. Meanwhile, Hunter leaves his risque drawings of Neeta on her desk.(n)

programme.title: Coach Trip

programme.title: Baby Daddy

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: She Loves Me, She Loves Me Note.

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Jeff's plans to go on a boys-only weekend away are ruined when Audrey's medical results do not arrive on time. Meanwhile, Russell's father arrives in town and seems intent on meeting Liz, and Adam befriends actor Curtis Armstrong.(n)

programme.title: Rules of Engagement
programme.desc: Audrey is unable to speak following her surgery, so Jeff has to help with a speech at her aunt's funeral. Timmy coerces Russell into giving him a pay rise, and Adam is disappointed to discover he only gets special treatment because of his good looks.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Mel and Joe's friendship with Nate and Gillian is jeopardised when a secret is revealed, and Zander begs Ryder to let him move into the basement without Lennox's knowledge, after he drops out of art school. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Melissa & Joey
programme.desc: Lennox secretly dates her teaching assistant, and when Joe and Mel find out, they try to put an end to the relationship - only things do not go according to plan. Starring Melissa Joan Hart and Joey Lawrence.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.desc: Riley realises she has to tell Danny she has feelings for him before his relationship with Robyn gets more serious. Tucker is unhappy with his love life, so Ben and Bonnie invent a secret admirer to give him some much needed confidence. However, the plot goes awry when they use a random photo of a model and Tucker encounters her by chance in the street.(n)

programme.title: Baby Daddy
programme.sub-title: Home Is Where the Wheeler Is.

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Robin faces being deported back to Canada unless she can find work in seven days, and after an unsuccessful interview for a newsreader position, Barney helps her create a video to impress a TV channel. Starring Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris and Alyson Hannigan.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Jess tries to stop one of her pupils picking on a classmate - only to become the new target of the bully's wrath. Schmidt is desperate to brag about his Valentine's Day exploits, but finds his partner is far less keen, while Nick is plunged into despair by a gift from Julia.(n)

programme.title: New Girl
programme.desc: Nick injures his back during a game of touch football, so Jess takes him to see a doctor. However, an initial scan reveals a potentially serious problem, forcing him to take stock of his life. His friends, meanwhile, are unsure what they can do to help.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Jake is excited to work a case with the best detective in the NYPD, Dave Majors - until his colleague shares his intentions to ask Amy out on a date. Rosa's surprising fashion choice causes a stir, and Charles and Gina make an unexpected discovery. Comedy, with Andy Samberg.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine
programme.desc: Holt begins to worry he is being set up for a fall by one of his superiors, and Peralta is handed the chance to work on an important case. Meanwhile, Jeffords tries to make sure his twins get a place at their chosen school. Comedy, with Andy Samberg and Terry Crews.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard and Sheldon's flat is burgled, so they work on a state-of-the-art security system in a bid to outwit any future would-be thieves. However, their plans go awry when they ensnare Penny in a net. Comedy, starring Johnny Galecki and Jim Parsons.(n)

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Having acknowledged their mutual attraction, Robin and Barney feel uncertain about how to behave toward each other and decide to date in secret. Elsewhere, Ted's first day as a lecturer at Columbia does not go to plan.(n)

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother
programme.desc: Barney finds it hard to adapt when his relationship with Robin becomes official, and she worries about whether her boyfriend will be able to give up his bachelor ways - but Ted overhears her airing her concerns. American sitcom, starring Neil Patrick Harris and Cobie Smulders.(n)

programme.title: Brooklyn Nine-Nine

The Emmy-winning show revolutionized the sports-news genre by deftly mixing information with irreverence in a hip, daily scrapbook of homers, touchdowns and slam dunks, the perfect clips-and-controversies fix for sports junkies. Staple features besides game scores and highlights include expert breakdowns, 'Top Ten Plays', Web polls and trivia(n)

programme.title: SC Featured
programme.desc: In-depth athlete profiles and unique stories from all areas of the sports world(n)

programme.title: Around the Horn
programme.desc: Columnists from around the U.S. debate hot sports topics in a competitive format and weigh in on stories from their region(n)

programme.title: Pardon the Interruption
programme.desc: Tony Kornheiser and Mike Wilbon face off in this half-hour debate. The journalists take two minutes to argue each point, and haggle their way through a variety of sports news(n)

programme.desc: ESPN Radio personality Colin Cowherd and Michelle Beadle host this sports talk show that's powered by the fans. The topics covered in this weekday show are chosen by fans voting on ESPN.com's SportsNation site(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Human Universe
programme.desc: Professor Brian Cox examines how it was that in a universe made of stars, rocks and endless space, a conscious civilisation was born. His latest adventure takes him from a submerged space station in Star City on the outskirts of Moscow, to Ethiopia, high above in the great Rift Valley, where he encounters the geladas, mankind's distant ancestors. Despite once being Africa's most successful primate, a species which at one time roamed across the entire continent, these days they are found in one just place in the remote Ethiopian Highlands. Cox investigates why these ancestors retreated, yet modern mankind has expanded across the planet.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of Bones
programme.desc: Evolutionary biologist Ben Garrod explores how having a skeleton has helped vertebrates to colonise and dominate almost every habitat on Earth. He begins his journey by looking at the influence of bones on size, revealing how they are capable of supporting large animals, with the strongest bone able to withstand 109 tons of pressure.(n)

programme.title: The Brain with David Eagleman
programme.desc: Neuroscientist David Eagleman takes viewers on a journey into the inner workings of the human brain, revealing how it affects thoughts, actions and beliefs.(n)

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough presents an insight into the most successful animals on the planet. Observing an Arctic fox stalk prey in its -20C environment, he reveals warm-bloodedness as one of the key factors in the mammals' global domination. He also studies marsupials in Australia and Central America, offering a unique view inside a platypus's breeding burrow.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: How Many People Can Live on Planet Earth?.
programme.desc: David Attenborough investigates the consequences of human population growth - from 2.5 billion in 1950 to seven billion today - both on people and the environment. While most of this increase has come from developing countries, studies suggest western lifestyles take an unfair share of the planet's resources, as the naturalist argues that a change in the way we live and even smaller families might be needed if mankind is to survive on Earth.(n)

programme.desc: The lives of creatures that are dangerous on land.(n)

programme.title: Home Shopping
programme.desc: A chance to purchase goods from the comfort of home.(n)

programme.title: Human Universe
programme.desc: In episode two, Professor Brian Cox is off to India, where he assesses arguably the first evidence of rational thought in literature, the poetry of the Vedic monks. They pondered mankind's origins, realising there must have been a day with no yesterday - a day of creation - prompting the age-old question of where did the universe come from? Brian marvels that the universe seems to follow a set of rules, the laws of physics, allowing space to be considered on the grandest scale, travelling to the most distant, farthest reaches of the cosmos just by using our minds. Brian also visits Japan, and offers viewers the idea that man lives in just one of an infinite number of universes that are being made all the time.(n)

programme.title: Secrets of Bones
programme.desc: Evolutionary biologist Ben Garrod explores how skeletons have adapted to allow vertebrates to move on land in different ways, such as swinging through trees, sliding along forest floors, and running across plains at speed. He looks at the spines of both cheetahs and snakes, and uncovers the role of the pentadactyl limb.(n)

programme.title: The Brain with David Eagleman
programme.desc: The neuroscientist continues his exploration of the inner workings of the human brain, revealing how it gives rise to people's thoughts, emotions, memories and personality.(n)

programme.title: The Life of Mammals
programme.desc: David Attenborough offers an insight into insect-eating animals, including shrews that dive under water, moles that can `swim' in the Namib Desert, and New Zealand bats that hunt in packs on the ground, walking on their wrists and foraging. Plus, how hedgehogs and armadillos liven up their diet with fruit and birds' eggs, while pangolins and giant anteaters survive entirely on a diet of insects.(n)

programme.title: Horizon
programme.sub-title: The Nine Months that Made You.
programme.desc: An exploration of theories pioneered by British scientist Professor David Barker, who believes that the time people spend in the womb is so profoundly important that it could affect every area of their subsequent development, from health and personality to the lives of their children.(n)

programme.title: Wild Justice
programme.desc: A farmer believes a big cat is responsible for the death of one of his goats. Plus, wardens hunt for a marijuana plantation belonging to a drug cartel.(n)

programme.title: The Accused
programme.desc: Simultaneously gut-wrenching and provocative, The Accused follows the struggle of a young woman to find justice after she is publicly gang-raped in a local tavern. While it seems a straightforward enough case, there are some complicating issues involving the character and intent of the victim herself and also the culpability amongst those who witnessed the crime and did nothing to stop it. Sarah Tobias (Jodie Foster in a mesmerizing Oscar-winning turn) is a hard-living sexy little fireball who loves to party with her friends. The night of the rape, she had a fight with her boy friend and so goes to the bar to blow off a little steam. In the dark back room where the pool tables sit and pinball machines flash dimly against the walls, Sarah begins casually flirting, dancing around, drinking a bit and the next thing she knows she is tossed upon a pinball machine being brutally ravaged with guys lined up to have their way with her while other patrons stand around cheering. Badly beaten and traumatized, she ends up in the DA's office facing attorney Kathryn Murphy (Kelly McGillis) who listens and takes the case. But as Murphy learns more about Sarah, she becomes less pleased, for Sarah has a long, checkered past of drugs, booze and casual acquaintances that the defense can easily use to destroy her character. Rather than risk that, Murphy goes for a plea bargain that grants the guilty light sentences and frees them from having to admit that they committed rape. Sarah goes ballistic when she hears about the trial and harshly derides Murphy. The lawyer seems unsympathetic at first, but then she sees first hand the devastation the rape has wrought upon Sarah's life and decides to defy her bosses and continue fighting for justice using an entirely new tack. This time, instead of going after the rapists, she is going after the "passive" onlookers who may or may not have encouraged the crime. The Accused is loosely based upon the true story of a much-publicized 1983 case from New Bedford, Massachusetts(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: Broken Arrow
programme.desc: Action thriller in which a young military pilot battles against a former colleague who has stolen two nuclear warheads. Two of the US military's best pilots are assigned the task of flying a new top secret bomber on a test run(n)

programme.title: Best Laid Plans
programme.desc: Absolutely nobody is who he or she seems in this stylish thriller about a guy who wants to get out of his fly-speck hometown, the girlfriend who wants to help him, and the successful friend who just might make it possible. When Bryce (Josh Brolin) returns to his tiny hometown of Tropico, NV, he finds pal Nick (Alessandro Nivola) still living there unhappily. One night the pair meets a beautiful blonde at the bar and eventually Bryce takes her back to the house where he's staying. When the girl, Lissa (Reese Witherspoon), reveals that she's under age and threatens to turn Bryce in for statutory rape, he panics, ties her up in the basement, and puts in an anguished call to Nick. Little does Bryce realize, however, that Lissa is actually Nick's very grown-up girlfriend, and that the two lovers have decided Bryce and the ritzy house where he's staying will play a major role in their bid to leave behind dead-end Tropico forever(n)

programme.title: The Walk
programme.desc: In this drama based on a true story, tightrope walker Philippe Petit crosses back and forth between the Twin Towers in 1974. Petit works to accomplish this feat while dealing with logistical problems and the concern of his loved ones(n)

programme.title: World Without End
programme.desc: Checkmate. In the series finale, Caris and Merthin are reunited, but their happiness is short-lived, as Godwyn will stop at nothing to destroy Caris and see her burned as a witch. Also: The King's Army arrives on a mission to quell the peasant rebellion and destroy Kingsbridge(n)

programme.title: Silent Hill
programme.desc: Sharon is a very sick child, yet rather than seeing her child suffer the cruel indignities of the medical profession, Rose ignores her husband's pleas and absconds with her ailing daughter to the fog-enshrouded town of Silent Hill. A town drenched in darkness and inhabited by a strange collection of menacing spectres, Silent Hill seemingly swallows young Sharon whole upon arrival(n)

programme.title: The International
programme.desc: Thriller about Interpol agent Louis Salinger and Manhattan District Attorney Eleanor Whitman, who attempt to expose a major international bank's role in illegal arms trading. The financial giant's dealings in money laundering and weapon trading threaten to bring down the Western world, crippling nations with debt while financing terror and war(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh directs Disney's 2015, live-action take on the classic fairy tale Cinderella, which stars Lily James as the put-upon young women forced to endure a life of labor at the hands of her stepmother (Cate Blanchett) after her father dies unexpectedly. Forced to do every menial chore imaginable, Ella maintains her good spirits and eventually strikes up a friendship with a stranger in the woods who turns out to be the prince. When the royal court holds a gala ball, Cinderella wants nothing more to attend, and although her stepmother won't allow it, she gets help from a surprising source(n)

programme.title: Monster House
programme.desc: A suburban home has become physically animated by a vengeful human soul looking to stir up trouble from beyond the grave, and it's up to three adventurous kids from the neighbourhood to do battle with the structural golem(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: A St. Bernard puppy 'adopts' a new home after escaping from dog thieves. The Newton family just haven't realised the trouble that 185 pounds of dog can get into...(n)

Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: My Stepmother Is an Alien
programme.desc: When lonesome astronomer Dr. Steve Mills (Dan Aykroyd) sees the extraordinarily beautiful but incredibly awkward Celeste (Kim Basinger) at a party, the last thing he would believe is that she is a space alien on a mission to do whatever it takes to save her planet, but he learns the truth when, despite her dubious intentions, he and Celeste decide to marry. Things get dangerous when Celeste's superior, whom she keeps in her magic handbag, decides to take care of matters himself(n)

programme.title: Cinderella
programme.desc: Kenneth Branagh directs Disney's 2015, live-action take on the classic fairy tale Cinderella, which stars Lily James as the put-upon young women forced to endure a life of labor at the hands of her stepmother (Cate Blanchett) after her father dies unexpectedly. Forced to do every menial chore imaginable, Ella maintains her good spirits and eventually strikes up a friendship with a stranger in the woods who turns out to be the prince. When the royal court holds a gala ball, Cinderella wants nothing more to attend, and although her stepmother won't allow it, she gets help from a surprising source(n)

programme.title: Sabrina
programme.desc: Romantic drama about a teenage girl who falls for a handsome, wealthy man from afar - only to find herself capturing his eye when she blossoms into a beautiful young woman(n)

programme.title: Aloha
programme.desc: A disgraced military defense contractor (Bradley Cooper) is rehired by an old boss to oversee the launch of a weapons satellite in Hawaii. Upon his arrival he reconnects with an old love (Rachel McAdams) but finds himself becoming increasingly attracted to an Air Force pilot (Emma Stone) assigned to watch over him(n)

programme.title: The Fifth Element
programme.desc: The mysterious fifth element when combined with four others creates the ultimate weapon against universal evil. The story begins in 1914 when benign aliens visit an ancient Egyptian temple to steal four stones containing information about this mysterious element. The visitors promise to return to Earth in the future to save it from evil. Three centuries pass and Earth is threatened by a thunderous Cosmic Evil. Unfortunately, the Evil killed the Good aliens who promised to save the planet. Fortunately, Earthlings have a piece of one of the alien saviors. Utilizing DNA restructuring, scientists grow the piece into a perfect new alien which takes the form of a curvaceous, seductive no-holds barred redheaded acrobat who escapes from the lab with the police in hot pursuit. Desperately she dives into a cab reluctantly driven by luckless former special force officer (Bruce Willis) who suddenly finds himself faced with the task of saving the universe by finding the missing stones and vanquishing the evil forces. Featuring dazzling special effects and classy production values coupled with a healthy splash of outlandish high fashion the emphasis of Besson's film is not so much plot as it is over-the top spectacle(n)

programme.title: Mystic Pizza
programme.desc: Engaging coming-of-age study about the romantic entanglements of three young women at a pizzeria(n)

programme.title: Clerks II
programme.desc: Kevin Smith's hilarious sequel to his raunchy 1994 breakthrough movie revisits the world of New Jersey slackers Dante (Brian O'Halloran) and Randal (Jeff Anderson), who are now working at a fast-food restaurant. Rosario Dawson, Jason Mewes, Trevor Fehrman(n)

programme.title: State Property 2
programme.desc: Hip-hop mogul Damon Dash wrote, directed, and stars in this hard-hitting examination of life in the criminal underground of a great city. Three different crime bosses are locked in a battle over the drug trade in Philadelphia. New York transplant Dame (Damon Dash) and his umbrella crew command a powerful network that controls the city's dope traffic, but he has two bitter rivals who both oversee competing gangs from behind bars -- Beans (Beanie Siegel), Philly-born leader of the once-dominant ABM Crime Syndicate, and Loco (Noreaga), a slick street hustler from Miami who has the bankroll to finance a powerful operation. As these three men and their underlings scramble for money and power, another player is quietly consolidating his forces and rising up against them. State Property 2: Philly Streets also features supporting performances from Mariah Carey, Ol' Dirty Bastard, Cam'ron, and a handful of other hip-hop and R&B stars(n)

programme.title: Child's Play 3
programme.desc: Killer-doll Chucky goes to military school. Justin Whalin, Perrey Reeves. Tyler: Jeremy Sylvers. Shelton: Travis Fine. Whitehurst: Dean Jacobson. Voice of Chucky: Brad Dourif. Sullivan: Peter Haskell. Col. Cochrane: Dakin Matthews. Directed by Jack Bender(n)

programme.desc: The Trouble with Harry. Hulk Hogan's visit to B.A. is interrupted when the Team helps a troubled youth save his alcoholic father from gangsters. William "The Refrigerator" Perry appears as himself. Harry: Paul Gleason. Jeffrey: Billy Jacoby. Hannibal: George Peppard(n)

programme.title: Hudson Hawk
programme.desc: Before The Da Vinci Code there was Hudson Hawk, an action comedy starring Bruce Willis as an international cat burglar who is duped into stealing priceless works of art by Leonardo Da Vinci. Unbeknown to him, the paintings contain hidden codes that reveal how to invent a machine that converts lead into gold, and his mystery benefactors plan to use it for world domination. Fun from start to finish, this has now become a firm cult classic. Also starring Andie MacDowell, Richard E Grant and Danny Aiello(n)

programme.desc: On his way to start a new life, an ex-CIA agent gets caught up in a small town run by an ambitious millionaire who oppresses the inhabitants with fear. Meanwhile, the man has to fend off active agents who are trying to eliminate him(n)

programme.title: Men at Work
programme.desc: Two garbage men's lives are turned upside down when they discover the city commissioner's body in a trash bin on their route. Over the next 24 hours, they frantically try to keep the body hidden, elude underworld goons and find the real killer(n)

programme.title: Redbelt
programme.desc: Tim Allen and Chiwetel Ejiofor co-star in writer/director David Mamet's martial arts drama Redbelt. Ejiofor plays Mike Terry, a jujitsu master who co-runs a very modest martial arts studio in Los Angeles with his bossy wife, Sondra (Alice Braga). Mike demonstrates an unwavering commitment to his craft and draws a cadre of defiantly loyal pupils including Joe (Max Martini), an LAPD cop. All told, it appears that he has chosen a peaceful and conflict-free path in life. The dedicated martial artist's fate takes an unanticipated turn, however, one evening when a young woman named Laura (Emily Mortimer) bursts into the academy in a state of near hysteria, and reaches for a policeman's gun when he tries to restrain her. One thing leads to another, and before long, Laura is regularly receiving martial arts lessons from Mike. As master begins to teach pupil and his martial arts philosophies emerge, his path also crisscrosses with that of a Hollywood movie star, Chet Frank (Tim Allen), when he saves the fellow from a beating at a local club and gets invited (along with Sondra) to Chet's house for dinner. Chet extends gestures of friendship, and Mike's guard breaks down; he speaks openly and candidly of a special martial arts method he employs that requires one of the participants to "assume a handicap." In time, the association with Chet leads to involvement in the motion-picture industry, and relations with a bevy of characters who aren't exactly what they seem -- including a pay-per-view fight mogul (Ricky Jay) and Chet's slimy and manipulative manager (Joe Mantegna)(n)

programme.title: Leverage
programme.desc: Ford's team fights for justice on behalf of an Army reservist who was wounded in Iraq but has been refused compensation.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A US Marine visits the home of his former captain, only to find the man has been killed, and the killer is waiting inside the property. While the soldier escapes with his life, the attacker gets away too. It quickly emerges the prime suspect is Qasim, an Afghan translator evidence, and evidence points against him, until it is discovered he has a brother, who is loyal to the Taliban. The subsequent chain of evidence leads Gibbs and Bishop to Afghanistan.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: A Naval intelligence ensign is killed in an unusual car accident. Gibbs and his team are reunited with old friend Ned Dorneget, who is now working with NCIS cyber operations, and NSA attorney Jake Malloy to investigate the case, and discover a conspiracy involving terrorist recruitment on the internet.(n)

programme.title: The Closer
programme.desc: A major shootout results in the deaths of two patrol cops and an 18-year-old youth. programme.desc: Ford and the team visit Kentucky to help seek redress on behalf of Eliot's former sweetheart, a racehorse trainer whose stables have been destroyed in a fire deliberately started by a Wall Street broker.(n)

programme.desc: The team comes to the aid of Nate's old friend Father Paul, whose church faces demolition at the hands of a ruthless developer.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Special Agent Ned Dorneget of the NCIS cyber division joins the team to further their investigation into The Calling, the insidious terror network radicalising youngsters via the internet. When it emerges young suicide bomber Bradley was not, in fact, affiliated with The Calling, Gibbs and his colleagues realise they might be back to square-one. Determined to bring the organisation down, the agents pursue two new leads, an arms dealer who may be supplying The Calling with their signature German S-mines, and another boy given a deadly mission by the terrorists. Guest starring Matt Jones.(n)

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: The death of Special Agent Ned Dorneget hits the team hard, and when Gibbs receives a visit from his late colleague's mother - CIA Officer Joanna Teague - he must decide whether to let her help with the investigation into the Calling. Meanwhile, Gibbs hopes his young charge Luke, formerly one of the Calling's radicalised footsoldiers, might be key to bringing the organisation down. However, when the terrorists discover where their defecting comrade has taken refuge, the abduct him and flee to Iraq. The team follows hot on their heels, but it seems Luke's ties to the Calling might be stronger than anyone at NCIS ever anticipated. Naval crime drama, starring Mark Harmon, with guest Mimi Rogers.(n)

programme.desc: Lincoln's frustration grows as he struggles to understand what really happened to Michael. Meanwhile, C-Note worries he will not be able to execute his new escape plan fast enough.(n)

programme.desc: Meg reveals her infatuation with a popular boy at school, Kent Lastname. Esther suggests that she ask him out, but she fears almost certain rejection. Meanwhile, Stewie overhears the hunk mentioning Meg's brother and begins to think he might be gay.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: As the Griffins prepare for the festive season by decorating their tree, Meg finds an ornament of the manger and Peter tells the story of Christmas - with a twist. His account begins with Joseph and his friend Robby spotting Mary in their village and becoming acquainted. After many dates, the future Holy guardian is annoyed by his girlfriend's reluctance to have sex, and she claims there is something special intended for her.(n)

programme.desc: A disturbance in Stan's daily bedtime routine unleashes his alter-ego, a do-gooder intent on completing all the heroic deeds he would never normally even contemplate. Animated comedy, with the voice of Seth MacFarlane.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Carter has a heart attack and lapses into a deep coma, so Peter takes over the running of his company Pewterschmidt Industries, but becomes power-mad and ends up firing every member of the board of directors.(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter hits his head and develops total amnesia, leaving Lois facing the task of reacquainting him with his friends and family - not to mention such skills as driving and having sex.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Steve and his friends take a road trip to Snot's father's funeral, but the youngster's commitment to his mourning pal wavers when he falls in love along the way. Meanwhile, Stan and Roger create an automatic cake-cutting machine for the home shopping network - but disagree how to split the profits.(n)

programme.title: American Dad
programme.desc: Hayley tries to fit in with a popular group of former high-school friends and, in the process, discovers that Steve has a talent for forging IDs. She uses him to start a business, but they soon come up against another fake ID kingpin - Roger.(n)

programme.desc: Bobby Briggs, the criminal who paralysed Joe years before, breaks out of jail - but he does not bargain on the community's hostile reception, as Quagmire, Joe and Peter unite to hunt him down. Meanwhile, Brian grows jealous when Lois gets a cat to look after.(n)

programme.title: American Dad

programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: New series. Gibbs fights for his life on board a US Navy hospital ship after being shot. Meanwhile, DiNozzo and Joanna Teague head for Shanghai, where they hope to take down the leaders of the terrorist group known as The Calling. programme.title: NCIS
programme.desc: Gibbs throws himself back into his work following his near-death experience, updating his appearance and tackling a new risky case alongside DEA agent Luis Mitchell, who wants help bringing down a drugs cartel. Concerned about his colleague's apparent enthusiasm to re-enter the field, DiNozzo discovers Mitchell is the son of a former NCIS agent who gave his life trying to save Gibbs' late wife and daughter, and this attachment is causing Gibbs to break his own rule against personal involvement in a case. However, a significant danger is posed by Benson Long, the cartel's head, and Mitchell's top target.(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Principal Charming. Marge Simpson (voice of Julie Kavner) is married and has settled into what can pass for domestic bliss on a good day, but her older twin sisters, Patty and Selma Bouvier (both also voiced by Kavner), are still single, and while Patty's indifferent attitude about men means it's not much of a problem for her, Selma tells Marge that she longs to have a man in her life. Marge doesn't know many single men, and asks Homer (voice of Dan Castellaneta) to find Selma a boyfriend. Homer's circle of acquaintances doesn't yield much in the way of eligible bachelors, but eventually he's able to fix Selma up on a date with Seymour Skinner (voice of Harry Shearer), the tightly wound principal of Springfield's elementary school. However, it soon becomes obvious Seymour isn't much interested in Selma, but has fallen head over heels for Patty. Patty grudgingly allows Seymour to court her, which leaves Selma all the more despondent, and she's soon forced to turn to Homer's alcoholic friend Barney (also voiced by Castellaneta) for company. The almost-romantic "Principal Charming" was first aired on Valentine's Day, February 14, 1991(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Two Bad Neighbors. It's been a pretty good day for Homer Simpson (voice of Dan Castellaneta) -- he made the neighborhood rummage sale into a rousing success and even sold his denim jacket with "Disco Stu" emblazoned on the back ("I wanted to write 'Disco Stud' but I ran out of space"). But Homer finds himself upstaged when a new neighbor moves into the big house across the street -- former president George Bush (voice of Harry Shearer). Homer and George don't get along very well, and Bart (voice of Nancy Cartwright) quickly becomes a thorn in Bush's side. After Bart accidentally destroys the manuscript of the former president's autobiography (in which he explains how he accomplished everything he set out to do in a single term in office, making winning the 1992 election unnecessary), Bush gives Bart a spanking, and Homer declares war on George Bush. Two Bad Neighbors first aired on January 14, 1996(n)

programme.desc: Two criminals kidnap pizza-delivery guy Nick and force him to rob a bank(n)

programme.title: Rise of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: Created in a San Francisco lab by an ambitious father-and-son scientist team seeking to eradicate Alzheimer's disease, genetically engineered chimp Caesar uses his powerful intellect to lead an ape uprising against all of humankind in this "Planet of the Apes" prequel(n)

programme.title: Dawn of the Planet of the Apes
programme.desc: In a world ravaged by a devastating virus, human survivors battle a breed of super-evolved apes for supremacy. Intelligent action. Violence/flashing images. (2014)(125 mins)(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: There's Something About Marrying. The secret's out! As Springfield legalises gay marriage, one of its fine citizens is going to come out of the closet..(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Marge's Son Poisoning. Marge buys a tandem bicycle and she and Bart go out together on it. Bart bonds with his mother but soon puts a halt to his mother-son time when the school bullies tease him for being a mummy's boy. And Homer takes up a new hobby; arm wrestling(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: G.I. (Annoyed Grunt). Homer accidentally gets signed up for basic training in the army. While trying to cajole the army into releasing Homer, Marge and Grandpa also get signed up. Later, a series of mishaps with a training exercise leaves the three Simpsons mistaken for terrorists(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: The Debarted. A new kid at school named Donny (voice of Topher Grace) works with Bart on his pranks. But when the pranks start to backfire, Bart wonders if he can trust his new accomplice. Meanwhile, the Simpsons get a fancy loaner car after Marge gets in an accident, and Homer falls in love with it(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Super Franchise Me. Marge starts her own sandwich store, but running a business proves challenging when a rival opens up across the street(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Every Man's Dream. Season 27 begins with Homer being diagnosed as a narcoleptic, which sends him on a bender, after which he returns home drunk. This prompts a visit to a marriage counselor and results in a trial separation from Marge, during which Homer finds himself a 20-something companion(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.sub-title: Homer and Lisa Exchange Cross Words
programme.desc: Homer and Lisa Exchange Cross Words. Forgetting about family ties, Homer bets against his daughter in a crossword contest. Can he make it up to Lisa? Hilarious and heart-warming(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons
programme.desc: Stealing First Base. Bart develops a crush on a girl (voice of Sarah Silverman) in his class. Meanwhile, Lisa's peers snub her for being an overachiever, but First Lady Michelle Obama (voice of Angela Bassett) comes to her defense(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Bel Panto: Part I. Part 1 of 2. A fundraiser goes awry due to party crashers(n)

programme.title: Archer
programme.desc: Bel Panto: Part II. Conclusion. Archer and Lana go missing as a hostage situation gets out of control(n)

programme.title: BSL Zone
programme.sub-title: BSL Zone: Found in the UK.
programme.desc: Three deaf people explain how coming to the UK helped them discover deaf culture, deaf identity and BSL.(n)

programme.title: It Came from Beneath the Sea
programme.desc: The captain of a nuclear submarine battles a gigantic octopus threatening to destroy San Francisco. Monster adventure, starring Kenneth Tobey, Faith Domergue and Donald Curtis, with special effects by Ray Harryhausen.(n)

programme.title: Ice Cold in Alex
programme.desc: The crew and passengers of an ambulance become stranded in the Libyan desert and face a perilous journey back to civilisation. Leading the trek is an alcoholic army captain, who vows to remain sober until he has completed the task - but his resolve is threatened by a stranger they rescue who is secretly an enemy spy. Second World War drama, with John Mills, Sylvia Syms, Anthony Quayle and Harry Andrews.(n)

programme.title: The Flight of the Phoenix
programme.desc: A plane crashes in the blazing heat of the desert - and as time passes, the crew and passengers realise their only chance of making it through the ordeal alive is to repair the badly damaged craft. Adventure, starring James Stewart, Richard Attenborough, Peter Finch and Ernest Borgnine.(n)

programme.title: Master and Commander: The Far Side of the World
programme.desc: The captain of a British warship engages in a tense battle of wits and an escalating test of nerves with a French counterpart during the Napoleonic conflict, a pursuit that takes his crew on a dangerous journey along the coast of South America. Seafaring drama, adapted from Patrick O'Brian's novels, starring Russell Crowe, Paul Bettany, James D'Arcy, Billy Boyd and Edward Woodall.(n)

programme.title: Unknown
programme.desc: A doctor on a business trip in Germany ends up in a coma after a car accident. He wakes up to find another man is claiming to be him, his wife does not recognise him and any evidence of his real identity has disappeared. He seeks the help of the woman who saved his life as he tries to find out what has happened. Thriller, starring Liam Neeson, Diane Kruger and January Jones.(n)

programme.title: Our Idiot Brother
programme.desc: A naive marijuana grower is released from prison to find his girlfriend has thrown him out of their farm. He turns to his three sisters for help, and as each takes a turn at giving him a place to stay, she finds her stable life thrown into chaos. Comedy, starring Paul Rudd, Elizabeth Banks, Zooey Deschanel and Emily Mortimer.(n)

programme.title: Nostalgia
programme.desc: Russian poet Andrei Gorchakov is accompanied by guide and translator Eugenia as he travels through Italy researching the life of an 18th-century composer. Andrei Tarkovsky's drama, starring Oleg Yankovskiy and Domiziana Giordano. In Russian and Italian.(n)

programme.title: Terror in a Texas Town
programme.desc: An embittered Scandinavian seaman sets out to avenge the murder of his farmer father, who was killed after refusing to bow to the demands of a ruthless land baron. Western, starring Sterling Hayden, Sebastian Cabot, Carol Kelly and Eugene Martin.(n)

programme.title: Mrs Pollifax - Spy
programme.desc: A bored widow desperate for excitement becomes an agent for the CIA. However, her first mission lands her in an Albanian jail, handcuffed to a handsome stranger. Espionage comedy, written by and starring Rosalind Russell, with Darren McGavin, Nehemiah Persoff and Harold Gould.(n)

programme.title: The Violent Men
programme.desc: A ruthless cattle baron sets out to create his own private empire, no matter what the cost. When he resorts to murder, he makes an enemy of a civil war veteran, while his lust for power drives his wife into the arms of his younger brother. Western, starring Edward G Robinson, Barbara Stanwyck and Glenn Ford.(n)

programme.title: One of Our Aircraft Is Missing
programme.desc: An RAF bomber is shot down during a raid on Stuttgart, forcing its crewmen to bail out over Nazi-occupied Holland. Trying to evade capture, they are assisted by a group of Dutch resistance fighters, who help them make it safely to the North Sea coast. Powell and Pressburger's Second World War drama, starring Godfrey Tearle, Eric Portman and Hugh Williams.(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: The inventor of an advanced form of intelligent robot is found dead, and the detective investigating the case is certain that one of the scientist's mechanical creations is responsible - but no one believes his theory because the robots have been programmed to prevent them from harming humans. Sci-fi thriller, inspired by the Isaac Asimov stories, starring Will Smith, Bridget Moynahan and Alan Tudyk.(n)

programme.title: Star Trek
programme.desc: The trainee crew members of the starship Enterprise embark on their maiden flight, which pits them against a Romulan commander from the future who is planning a horrific revenge on those he blames for a tragedy in his own time. Sci-fi adventure based on the original TV series, starring Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Eric Bana, Zoe Saldana and Leonard Nimoy.(n)

programme.title: The Watch
programme.desc: A small-town supermarket manager organises a neighbourhood watch group to patrol his community after a suspicious death, but finds the only recruits he can gather do not take the job seriously. They soon face a greater threat than crime when they uncover a secret alien invasion going on under their noses. Sci-fi comedy, starring Ben Stiller, Vince Vaughn, Jonah Hill and Richard Ayoade.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Ria loses her head and tells Ben she is leaving him. She goes for a walk in the park and bumps into Leonard, who wants to rekindle their relationship, but Ria is unsure what to do. Last-ever episode of the comedy, starring Wendy Craig, Geoffrey Palmer and Bruce Montague.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin looks forward to his annual Austrian holiday with Anne, Howard and Hilda. Comedy, starring Richard Briers and Penelope Wilton. First broadcast February 19, 1984.(n)

programme.title: Sorry
programme.desc: Timothy's bags are packed and he is prepared to move into his new home - but his mother makes one last effort to clip his wings.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean and Lionel settle down to enjoy a quiet evening, only to find themselves constantly disturbed by ominous noises from the empty house next door. Comedy, starring Judi Dench and Geoffrey Palmer.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Bob feels the strain of Thelma's absence, so Terry promptly suggests he move in until she decides to come home. Comedy, starring James Bolam, Rodney Bewes and Brigit Forsyth.(n)

programme.title: Butterflies
programme.desc: Ria loses her head and tells Ben she is leaving him. She goes for a walk in the park and bumps into Leonard, who wants to rekindle their relationship, but Ria is unsure what to do. Last-ever episode of the comedy, starring Wendy Craig, Geoffrey Palmer and Bruce Montague.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del-Boy enters the import trade after striking a deal with Boycie to fetch a consignment of dodgy diamonds across from Holland, and ropes in Rodney and Uncle Albert to help. Their plans are jeopardised when old foe Chief Inspector Slater picks up the Trotters' trail. Feature-length episode of the comedy, guest starring Jim Broadbent, with David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Buster Merryfield.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Abi tries to cook a meal for her future mother-in-law and discovers she is not prepared to give up Roger without a fight.
