programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Smiler's first day as a door-to-door salesman is not a happy one as his suitcase collapses on his foot and puts him in a wheelchair. Meanwhile, with Barry still seeking promotion at work, Glenda decides to have a word with his boss. Comedy, starring Peter Sallis, Stephen Lewis and Mike Grady.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Barry Go Septic Despite Listening to Classical Music?.
programme.desc: Compo, Clegg and Truly are intrigued when they meet a man testing for earthquakes. Roy Clarke's long-running comedy set in rural Yorkshire, starring Bill Owen, Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Truly buys an old lawnmower from Auntie, which Compo and Clegg promptly help him to sell. Meanwhile, Marina generates gossip with her pastry purchase. Comedy, starring Frank Thornton, Bill Owen and Peter Sallis.(n)

programme.title: My Family
programme.desc: Abi tries to cook a meal for her future mother-in-law and discovers she is not prepared to give up Roger without a fight. Ben looks forward to a visit from an old college pal, only to find out Charlie is not the man he used to be. Comedy, starring Robert Lindsay and Zoe Wanamaker.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright is embarrassed after losing his trousers on the way to the wedding of Nurse Gladys Emmanuel's niece. Roy Clarke's classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and Lynda Baron.(n)

programme.title: Open All Hours
programme.desc: Arkwright invents a saint's day as a pretext for checking the pockets of a foreign visitor suspected of shoplifting. Classic comedy, starring Ronnie Barker and David Jason.(n)

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: Comedy following the ups and downs of three newly retired couples living in the Norfolk resort of Thurnemouth. The gang prepares for the funeral of old friend Jean, although Alan seems more interested that her ex-husband, his old pal Mick, is flying over from Spain for the service. John is wary of the visitor, convinced he has had a thing for his wife Maureen ever since a notorious holiday in Weymouth many moons ago. Meanwhile, Joyce is preoccupied with the thought of her daughter-in-law giving birth any day now. Philip Jackson, Alison Steadman, Russ Abbot, Stephanie Beacham, Paula Wilcox and James Smith star, with a guest appearance by Nigel Planer.(n)

programme.title: Boomers
programme.desc: Comedy following the ups and downs of three newly retired couples living in the Norfolk resort of Thurnemouth. Joyce has organised a special lunch at a trendy gastropub to celebrate Carol and Trevor's 40th wedding anniversary, but her finely tuned plans are somewhat ruined by the arrival of Maureen and her lightweight mother Joan. Carol also looks set to put a dampener on the happy occasion with a rather unfortunate announcement, unless Joyce and Maureen can convince her to change her mind before she lives to regret it. Paula Wilcox, Alison Steadman, Stephanie Beacham, June Whitfield and James Smith star.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Nana is in mourning for her friend Elsie, but her grief tries Jim's patience as she drowns her sorrows with brandy. Liz Smith and Ricky Tomlinson star.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.sub-title: Jack Dee, Jason Manford & Russell Howard.
programme.desc: Jack Dee hosts the stand-up show from London's Hammersmith Apollo, with guest comedians Jason Manford and Russell Howard. Between them, the trio regale the audience with their thoughts on the polar ice-caps, wimpy professional footballers, canine funerals, internet dating and muggers.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Mark tries to deflect the inevitable bad PR when he and Sophie return to work following their non-existent honeymoon. Meanwhile, Jeremy and Super Hans's band performs its first gig. Comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Gimme Gimme Gimme
programme.desc: Linda's long-lost son appears, and he is none too pleased with what he finds. Meanwhile, Tom comes over all broody when Suze goes into labour. Comedy, starring Kathy Burke and James Dreyfus as the mismatched friends.(n)

programme.title: The Royle Family
programme.desc: Nana is in mourning for her friend Elsie, but her grief tries Jim's patience as she drowns her sorrows with brandy. Liz Smith and Ricky Tomlinson star.(n)

programme.title: Getting On
programme.desc: A graduate nurse drives a wedge between Den and Kim, Hilary's new hand-washing protocols cause frustration, and Pippa has to reapply for her own job. Meanwhile, Kim and Den find a way to brighten the mood in the ward - but Dr Moore struggles to see the funny side. Comedy drama, starring Jo Brand, Joanna Scanlan and Vicki Pepperdine.(n)

programme.title: Harry Hill's TV Burp
programme.desc: Harry returns with his comic review of soap sagas, reality shows and documentaries. From 2009.(n)

programme.title: Nighty Night
programme.desc: In the final episode of the series, Jill's misdeeds begin to catch up with her. Glen escapes from the mental institution seeking revenge, and Cath has her suspicions when Jill's pregnancy enters its 11th month. However, Don is too drunk and depressed to cope with anything.(n)

programme.title: The Thin Blue Line
programme.desc: DI Grim does a spot of moonlighting at Scotland Yard, leaving Inspector Fowler with a bitter taste in his mouth as he struggles to keep the yobbish CID mob in order. Ben Elton's cop-shop comedy, starring Rowan Atkinson.(n)

programme.title: The Piglet Files
programme.desc: Nicholas Lyndhurst stars as a recently appointed MI5 agent with the codename Piglet in this bungling spy drama.(n)

programme.title: Ever Decreasing Circles
programme.desc: Martin suspects Paul will try to sabotage his vicars and tarts party. Comedy, starring Richard Briers, Peter Egan and Penelope Wilton. First broadcast February 26, 1984.(n)

programme.title: My Hero
programme.desc: After being saved from certain death by the world-famous Thermoman while on holiday, nurse Janet Dawkins doesn't expect to see her saviour again - until an oddball Irish hypochondriac visits her health centre. First-ever episode of the sitcom, starring Ardal O'Hanlon as the Lycra-clad superhero.(n)

programme.title: As Time Goes By
programme.desc: Jean begins to think that, 19 months after tying the knot, her marriage may have become stale. She wonders whether a few surprises from Lionel would spice things up, so Alistair, helped by Judith and Sandy, comes up with a plan to give her the treat of a lifetime.(n)

programme.title: Whatever Happened to the Likely Lads
programme.desc: Bob wallows in self-pity, convinced he will never be able to cope without Thelma and increasingly worried about what the neighbours will think of Terry's home-making efforts. Starring Rodney Bewes, James Bolam and Brigit Forsyth.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.desc: Smiler's first day as a door-to-door salesman is not a happy one as his suitcase collapses on his foot and puts him in a wheelchair. Meanwhile, with Barry still seeking promotion at work, Glenda decides to have a word with his boss. Comedy, starring Peter Sallis, Stephen Lewis and Mike Grady.(n)

programme.title: Last of the Summer Wine
programme.sub-title: Will Barry Go Septic Despite Listening to Classical Music?.
programme.desc: Compo, Clegg and Truly are intrigued when they meet a man testing for earthquakes. Roy Clarke's long-running comedy set in rural Yorkshire, starring Bill Owen, Peter Sallis and Frank Thornton.(n)

programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.sub-title: Three Men, a Woman and a Baby.
programme.desc: Rodney and Albert begin to worry the flat will get overcrowded as the birth of Del-Boy Jr approaches, while Del feels well prepared for fatherhood thanks to a stint at antenatal classes with Raquel. Starring David Jason and Nicholas Lyndhurst.(n)

programme.desc: The trio prepare to attend a friend's funeral, and Foggy decides they should all smarten up for the occasion. However, Compo's Maurice Chevalier outfit is not what he had in mind.(n)

programme.desc: The first ever episode of John Sullivan's classic comedy, originally broadcast in 1981, which introduced the viewing public to the Trotter family. programme.title: Only Fools and Horses
programme.desc: Del and Rodney make a bit of cash on a used-car deal and decide to celebrate in style with a night out in the West End. Vintage comedy, starring David Jason, Nicholas Lyndhurst and Lennard Pearce.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: The newlyweds begin leading separate lives back in their home towns. In Essex, Smithy makes efforts to remind Gavin of the excitement of his bachelor years with a traditional boys' night out. Meanwhile in Barry, Stacey tries to distract herself with a trip to the bingo.(n)

programme.title: Gavin & Stacey
programme.desc: Nessa goes into labour a month early in Barry, and the newlyweds must forget their differences to track down Smithy in time for the birth of his child. Meanwhile, Stacey returns to Essex to salvage her marriage.(n)

programme.title: Live at the Apollo
programme.desc: Jimmy Carr hosts the stand-up show from the world-famous Hammersmith Apollo, London, with guest comedian Alan Carr. The funnymen talk about bullies, estate agents and bread-making machines.(n)

programme.title: Peep Show
programme.desc: Jeremy runs out of money and descends into a world of hunger, homelessness and criminality. Meanwhile, Mark needs to find himself a girlfriend before his birthday party. Award-winning comedy, starring Robert Webb and David Mitchell.(n)

programme.title: Men Behaving Badly
programme.desc: Gary and Tony are horrified to learn Deborah is planning to sell up and travel around Asia, but their attempts to change her mind seem doomed to failure - until a smooth-talking estate agent arrives to value the flat. programme.title: Carnival Eats
programme.desc: Noah Cappe travels to Guthrie, Oklahoma, for the 89'er Days Festival, before heading to Virginia for the Pungo Strawberry Festival.(n)

programme.title: Rachel Allen's Everyday Kitchen
programme.desc: The chef rustles up food for hot sunny weather, including a nutty quinoa salad, a potato, smoked salmon and dill tart and a spinach, bacon and Gruyere frittata. Plus, more tricks of the trade from Rachel's school kitchen and a glimpse of her working life as she visits London.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: It's the quarter-final and Mary Berry and Paul Hollywood test how the five remaining contestants cope with unconventional flours and unusual desserts, beginning by baking a signature loaf using non-traditional flours such as spelt, rye, potato and tapioca. In the technical challenge they each have to prepare a gluten-free dacquoise, which is made with meringue, coffee custard and hazelnut praline, before creating dairy-free novelty vegetable cakes for the showstopper round. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: The best cooks from this week's heats compete in the last quarter-final, preparing their finest two courses not only for judges John Torode and Gregg Wallace, but also for former MasterChef champions Thomasina Miers, Peter Bayless and Mat Follas. Who will have what it takes to earn one of 12 places in the knockout round?.(n)

programme.title: Destination Flavour Japan
programme.desc: Adam Liaw takes viewers on a culinary journey to Japan, beginning by discovering the delights of sea urchin, pond smelt and boutique cheesecake on the country's northern-most island Hokkaido.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers go in search of mothers who love to cook during lazy weekends, and discover the meals they enjoy preparing, including peach paradise pudding, chicken pie, beef stew and a plava cake. The bikers also rustle up banana pancakes with bacon and spiced teacakes and braised steaks, while historian Gerard Baker challenges five people to a ravioli-making contest.(n)

programme.title: James Martin's Food Map of Britain
programme.desc: Chef James Martin visits Northern Ireland in the hope of gaining an understanding of the rich flavours of the beef from native cattle the Dexter. He also visits the east coast, where he discovers why local lobsters are so prized by chefs, and cooks up a Goan lobster curry, and a fillet of Dexter beef served with a garlic and parsley risotto with caramelised onions.(n)

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: The chef makes dishes using game and mushrooms, starting with a delicate cep tortellini and following it up with a French pasty known as a pithivier, filled with pheasant, chestnuts and dried fruits. Raymond then rustles up a simple fricassee of wild mushrooms with herbs and croutons and finishes the demonstration with a salt-crust baked pigeon. He and restaurant maintenance manager Steve Truman also visit Scotland to join a shoot in Perthshire and pick fungi.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by Angela Hartnett for a discussion on how to make delicious, high-quality food on a tight budget, with the chef and restaurateur pitting her vanilla custard tart against the host's beef and blue cheese risotto. Plus, Oliver Peyton discovers how to spice up his life on the cheap, Kimberley Wilson lifts the lid on how to make great grub from waste food, and drinks expert Joe Wadsack selects the best cut-price wine.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Money Saving Meals
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver prepares a hearty fried chicken-in-a-bucket feast, before showing how to make a frugal noodle dish. He also cooks a sweet and spicy beef tagine, and gives his tips on cheese.(n)

programme.desc: The chef conjures up a slow recipe using lamb, and a plum pie.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The four semi-finalists face three French challenges, beginning by preparing three types of savoury canapes in just two-and-a-half hours. In the technical challenge they each have to make a Charlotte Royale, a dessert made with Swiss roll and creme bavaroise, before the showstopper round sees them bake opera cakes, which consist of layers of almond sponge with coffee buttercream filling and a chocolate topping. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present.(n)

programme.title: MasterChef
programme.desc: After five weeks of heats, 50 hopefuls have been whittled down to the most promising 12. But if they thought it was tough getting this far, the knockout stage will really sort the dishwashers from the chefs, as over the next two nights the remaining contestants are split into two groups of six to enter the hectic world of mass catering. Tonight's first group finds itself at Heathrow Airport, preparing lunch for more than 200 employees at British Airways' maintenance base. Then it's back to MasterChef HQ, where they have to rustle up 20 breakfast portions in just one hour, before the weakest individuals face each other in a cook-off to determine who will make it through to Friday's `showstopper' challenge.(n)

programme.title: The Hairy Bikers: Mums Know Best
programme.desc: Si King and Dave Myers meet three keen cooks from Northern Ireland who take inspiration from international cuisine. The duo sample paella and Catalan tomato bread, a chicken curry with handmade roti bread, and an Argentinean recipe using partridge. The bikers also prepare their version of haddock mornay and Gerard Baker organises another cookery challenge.(n)

programme.title: James Martin's Food Map of Britain
programme.desc: The chef's tour reaches the south coast of England, where he discovers how the forests of Hampshire are home to one of Britain's most prized culinary ingredients, the truffle, and why tomatoes grown on the Isle of Wight are rivalling those from Italy. Along the way, he prepares forest truffle chicken and stuffed tomatoes.(n)

programme.title: Raymond Blanc's Kitchen Secrets
programme.desc: The chef turns his attention to bread and yeast, beginning by making the French classic brioche and using it as a base for a celebratory gateau filled with lemon creme fraiche. Raymond then prepares beer-topped rolls, a basket-shaped loaf, and olive and tomato fougasse, before rustling up a dessert of apple croustade. He also visits Shipton Mill in Gloucestershire to experiment with gluten-free flour.(n)

programme.title: Food & Drink
programme.desc: Tom Kerridge is joined by Cyrus Todiwala (The Incredible Spice Men) to discuss the benefits of wholesome food, with the host challenging the award-winning Indian chef to come up with an alternative take on a curry to rival his own spice-crusted tuna salad. Comedienne Arabella Weir tries her hardest to fall in love with salad, and drinks expert Joe Wadsack picks a selection of healthy red wines.(n)

programme.title: Jamie's Money Saving Meals
programme.desc: Jamie Oliver reveals how meat-free meals can slash costs in the kitchen by preparing an aubergine dhal with Indian rice and home-made chapatis. Plus, he also makes a hot and spicy noodle soup with leftover beef, and a super-sized banh mi - a warm, crusty baguette filled with pork.(n)

programme.title: The Great British Bake Off
programme.desc: The four semi-finalists face three French challenges, beginning by preparing three types of savoury canapes in just two-and-a-half hours. In the technical challenge they each have to make a Charlotte Royale, a dessert made with Swiss roll and creme bavaroise, before the showstopper round sees them bake opera cakes, which consist of layers of almond sponge with coffee buttercream filling and a chocolate topping. Mel Giedroyc and Sue Perkins present.(n)

programme.title: The Cell
programme.desc: In this science fiction thriller, child psychiatrist Catherine Deane (Jennifer Lopez) has developed a technique that allows her to travel through the minds of her patients. When Stargher (Vincent D'Onofrio), a multiple murderer who methodically drowns his victims and performs bizarre rituals with their bodies, falls into a coma, FBI agent Peter Novak (Vince Vaughn) asks Deane to enter the killer's psyche, in the hope of finding a missing girl whom Stargher has kidnapped; if she's not soon found, in all likelihood she'll die in his torture cell. However, once Deane enters the bizarre world of Stargher's mind, she finds getting out to be a very difficult matter. The Cell was the first feature from director Tarsem, who previously made award-winning commercials and music videos, including the video for R.E.M.'s "Losing My Religion." The supporting cast includes Catherine Sutherland, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Dylan Baker, and Pruitt Taylor Vince(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This sparkling biopic of literary editor Max Perkins centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe. As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels, Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: An estranged husband-and-wife treasure hunting team decide to patch up their differences when news breaks of a potentially massive haul of booty on an old shipwreck on an island off the Florida coast. However, the murderous gangster rapper who owns the isle has brought in a rival bounty hunter, forcing the pair to battle against time - and their marital difficulties - if they are to reach the golden galleon(n)

programme.title: The Mothman Prophecies
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller, focussing on a journalist whose wife experienced a strange moth-like vision immediately before she was killed in a car accident. Two years later, while driving to an interview, he suddenly finds himself hundreds of miles out of his way in the remote town of Point Pleasant, where there has been a proliferation of mothman sightings. His research leads him to believe that these visions are omens of disaster(n)

But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Accused of cheating and desperate to prove his innocence, an eighteen-year-old orphan from the slums of Mumbai reflects back on his tumultuous life while competing to win 20 million rupees on India's Who Wants to Be a Millionaire in Danny Boyle's inspirational drama. Jamal Malik (Dev Patel) may not have a penny to his name, but that could all change in a matter of hours. He's one question away from taking the top prize on India's most popular television game show, but as with everything else in Jamal's life, it isn't going to be easy. Arrested by police under suspicion of cheating, Jamal is interrogated by the authorities. The police simply can't believe that a common "slumdog" could possibly possess the knowledge to get this far in the game, and in order to convince them of how he gained such knowledge, Jamal begins reflecting back on his childhood. As young boys, Jamal and his older brother, Salim, lived in squalor, and lost their mother in a mob attack on Muslims. Subsequently forced to rely on their own wits to survive, the desperate siblings fell back on petty crime, eventually befriending adorable yet feisty young Latika as they sought out food and shelter on the unforgiving streets of Mumbai. Though life on the streets was never easy, Jamal's experiences ultimately instilled in him the knowledge he needed to answer the tough questions posed to him on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire. And though Jamal makes a convincing case for himself, one question still remains: why would a young man with no apparent desire for wealth or fame be so determined to win big on a national game show? Of course, it won't be long until everyone finds out the answer to this burning question, because as Jamal sits down to find out whether he will be rich beyond his wildest dreams, 60 million viewers remain transfixed to their televisions eager to see if he'll correctly answer the final question(n)

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Lena has just moved to the small, Southern town of Gatlin, where the only person who seems to understand her -- or dream of bigger places or ideas -- is a cute guy named Ethan Wate (Alden Ehrenreich), who recognizes her instantly from the cryptic dreams he's been having every night. Lena is an orphan, and she's come to stay with her mysterious uncle, Macon Ravenwood (Irons), the patriarch of her powerful family. Powerful, because The Ravenwood clan are Casters, born with powers that ordinary mortals don't have, like the ability to move objects, control the elements, and even step out of normal space and time to communicate only with each other. But just as Lena feels ready to open up to Ethan, she discovers that their love is in imminent danger, because when female Casters turn 16, their destiny as either good or evil is revealed. Unwilling to let her nature be dictated by forces outside her control, Lena and Ethan set out together to uncover the strange, secret lore of their families' intertwined histories dating back to the Civil War, and figure out how to grant Lena the power to choose her own destiny(n)

programme.title: The Tuxedo
programme.desc: Clothes make the superspy in this high-energy action comedy. Jimmy Tong (Jackie Chan) is a well-meaning but clumsy New York City cab driver who is tapped by Steena (Debi Mazar), associate to multi-millionaire Clark Devlin (Jason Isaacs), for a new job as Devlin's personal limo driver. After a mysterious accident lands Devlin in the hospital, Tong learns that his new boss has a secret -- when he's not wheeling and dealing in high finance, Devlin is also a secret agent for the CSA, a top-level security agency. The secret to Devlin's success as a spy is his trademark tuxedo, a suit which is loaded with special gadgets which turns him into a high-tech fighting machine. After Tong dons the tuxedo and is transformed into a martial arts master, he takes over for Devlin and discovers that the agent's injuries didn't happen by accident. As Tong tries to chase down a handful of international super-villains bent on world conquest, he has to deal with Devlin's new partner, Del Blaine (Jennifer Love Hewitt), a CSA rookie who is just as baffled by her new assignment as Tong. The Tuxedo marked the feature-film debut for director Kevin Donovan, who had previously won international acclaim for his work in television commercials(n)

programme.title: The Cell
programme.desc: In this science fiction thriller, child psychiatrist Catherine Deane (Jennifer Lopez) has developed a technique that allows her to travel through the minds of her patients. When Stargher (Vincent D'Onofrio), a multiple murderer who methodically drowns his victims and performs bizarre rituals with their bodies, falls into a coma, FBI agent Peter Novak (Vince Vaughn) asks Deane to enter the killer's psyche, in the hope of finding a missing girl whom Stargher has kidnapped; if she's not soon found, in all likelihood she'll die in his torture cell. However, once Deane enters the bizarre world of Stargher's mind, she finds getting out to be a very difficult matter. The Cell was the first feature from director Tarsem, who previously made award-winning commercials and music videos, including the video for R.E.M.'s "Losing My Religion." The supporting cast includes Catherine Sutherland, Marianne Jean-Baptiste, Dylan Baker, and Pruitt Taylor Vince(n)

programme.title: Genius
programme.desc: This sparkling biopic of literary editor Max Perkins centers on his personal and professional relationship with eccentric author Thomas Wolfe. As Wolfe becomes consumed with his lengthy novels, Perkins struggles to reel in his talent in order to deliver another best-seller for Scribner Publishing during the 1930s(n)

programme.title: Fool's Gold
programme.desc: An estranged husband-and-wife treasure hunting team decide to patch up their differences when news breaks of a potentially massive haul of booty on an old shipwreck on an island off the Florida coast. However, the murderous gangster rapper who owns the isle has brought in a rival bounty hunter, forcing the pair to battle against time - and their marital difficulties - if they are to reach the golden galleon(n)

programme.title: The Mothman Prophecies
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller, focussing on a journalist whose wife experienced a strange moth-like vision immediately before she was killed in a car accident. Two years later, while driving to an interview, he suddenly finds himself hundreds of miles out of his way in the remote town of Point Pleasant, where there has been a proliferation of mothman sightings. His research leads him to believe that these visions are omens of disaster(n)

programme.title: Babylon A.D.
programme.desc: In the near-future, tough mercenary Toorop is hired to transport a girl from Russia to New York, unaware that she is believed by some to be the new messiah(n)

programme.title: Midnight Special
programme.desc: A father and his eight-year-old son go on the lam upon discovering that the boy possesses mysterious powers(n)

programme.title: The Divergent Series: Allegiant
programme.desc: After discovering the truth about their walled city and breaking down its faction system, Tris and Four lead a journey out of Chicago to learn more about who has been manipulating their civilization in this thrilling entry in the YA adventure series. But once their group comes face-to-face with the society that turned their city into an enclosed experiment, secrets are uncovered that threaten the fate of humankind(n)

programme.title: Baby Mama
programme.desc: Comedy about an uptight career woman whose broody impulses lead her to hire a surrogate to bear her a child. However, the obnoxious woman who agrees to carry her baby does not actually fall pregnant and has instead hatched a plan to keep the fee without having to give birth(n)

programme.title: Slumdog Millionaire
programme.desc: Accused of cheating and desperate to prove his innocence, an eighteen-year-old orphan from the slums of Mumbai reflects back on his tumultuous life while competing to win 20 million rupees on India's Who Wants to Be a Millionaire in Danny Boyle's inspirational drama. Jamal Malik (Dev Patel) may not have a penny to his name, but that could all change in a matter of hours. He's one question away from taking the top prize on India's most popular television game show, but as with everything else in Jamal's life, it isn't going to be easy. Arrested by police under suspicion of cheating, Jamal is interrogated by the authorities. The police simply can't believe that a common "slumdog" could possibly possess the knowledge to get this far in the game, and in order to convince them of how he gained such knowledge, Jamal begins reflecting back on his childhood. As young boys, Jamal and his older brother, Salim, lived in squalor, and lost their mother in a mob attack on Muslims. Subsequently forced to rely on their own wits to survive, the desperate siblings fell back on petty crime, eventually befriending adorable yet feisty young Latika as they sought out food and shelter on the unforgiving streets of Mumbai. Though life on the streets was never easy, Jamal's experiences ultimately instilled in him the knowledge he needed to answer the tough questions posed to him on Who Wants to Be a Millionaire. And though Jamal makes a convincing case for himself, one question still remains: why would a young man with no apparent desire for wealth or fame be so determined to win big on a national game show? Of course, it won't be long until everyone finds out the answer to this burning question, because as Jamal sits down to find out whether he will be rich beyond his wildest dreams, 60 million viewers remain transfixed to their televisions eager to see if he'll correctly answer the final question(n)

programme.title: Making of 'Jason Bourne'
programme.desc: A look at "Jason Bourne," a 2016 thriller based on novelist Robert Ludlum's character, and the fifth installment in the series. The film stars Matt Damon, Julia Stiles and Tommy Lee Jones, and is directed by Paul Greengrass(n)

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Policemen have always been the idols of Freddy Heflin. Due to being slightly deaf, Heflin could never pass the physical to become a police officer himself. However, because of his friendly, amiable nature, he's managed to get himself elected Sheriff of a small New Jersey county outside of New York City, and he lives in a town where many NYPD cops also live. Mo Tilden is an Internal Affairs investigator for the NYPD, and his investigation of some crooked cops leads him to this small town, and to Sheriff Freddy Heflin. Heflin begins to help Tilden, and discovers that some of his heroes may have feet of clay..(n)

programme.title: San Francisco 2.0
programme.desc: Filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi returns to the city of her birth to examine the effects of the technology industry on San Francisco's culture, identity, real-estate market, economy, neighborhoods and history, and discusses its past, present and future with politicians, entrepreneurs, journalists, small-business owners and lifelong residents(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage discovers that it's a wonderful life in this touching comic fantasy. He plays a rich, ruthless businessman who's shown the life he might have had by a guardian angel (Don Cheadle) who transforms him into a suburban working stiff with a wife (Tea Leoni), kids and minivan. Brett Ratner directed. Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek, Josef Sommer, Makenzie Vega(n)

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: A young race-car driver learns the world of auto racing is fixed in this adrenaline-charged, live-action adaptation of the seminal Japanese anime. With the help of his family, he competes in a cross-country rally in order to expose those responsible(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: 04/19/2017. A look back at the March 18 title bouts of pound-for-pound stars Gennady Golovkin and "Chocolatito" Gonzalez; correspondent Melissa Stark travels to the boxing hotbed of Mexico to gauge who is more popular: Canelo Alvarez or Julio Cesar Chavez Jr.; and the latest news and events in the sport(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A young Jewish atheist attends college in 1951 Ohio, where he clashes with the school's established social order and his overbearing parents' hopes for his future. At the same time, he falls for an attractive, complicated classmate named Olivia(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: The acclaimed graphic novel from crime writer Max Allan Collins becomes this big budget Dreamworks drama from director Sam Mendes and screenwriter David Self. Tom Hanks stars as Michael Sullivan, a morally conflicted Depression-era hit man committing murder in the name of his employer, John Rooney (Paul Newman). A kindly, aging Irish crime boss who raised Sullivan as his surrogate son, Rooney is affiliated with Al Capone in Chicago and thus wields great power in the "Tri-Cities" of Moline, IL; Rock Island, IL; and Davenport, IA. Curious about his father's mysterious profession, Sullivan's son, Michael Jr. (Tyler Hoechlin), stows away in his father's automobile one night and witnesses the execution of a man at the hands of Sullivan and Rooney's biological son, Connor (Daniel Craig). Although Michael keeps his promise to remain silent about what he's seen, the paranoid and unstable Connor tries to wipe out the entire Sullivan clan anyway, succeeding only in killing Sullivan's wife, Annie (Jennifer Jason Leigh), and youngest son, Peter (Liam Aiken). Enraged at this and another surprise betrayal by the Rooneys, Sullivan embarks on a path of bloody retribution, Michael in tow. Although he intends to leave his boy with relatives in the rural town of Perdition once the coast is clear, he ends up exposing Michael to the goriest aspects of his talents, slaughtering former associates as he dodges contract assassin Maguire (Jude Law) and cripples the cash flow of the Rooney and Capone organizations through a series of bank robberies, attempting to force either mob family to offer up the sequestered Connor as a sacrifice. Inspired by the popular Japanese comic book series Lone Wolf and Cub and based loosely on an episode from the life and career of notorious real-life crime figures John and Connor Looney, Road to Perdition co-stars Stanley Tucci as legendary Chicago mobster Frank Nitti(n)

programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: Comedy, sci-fi, drama and romance combine in this feel-good fantasy directed by Chris Columbus. Robin Williams shines (literally) as an android named Andrew, a handy-robotman who develops human emotions over the centuries. Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz, Oliver Platt(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Director Richard LaGravenese's romantic drama stars Hilary Swank as Holly Kennedy, a New York real estate agent forced to come to terms with the unexpected death of her young Irish husband Gerry. Before he died, Gerry wrote her a series of letters, to be delivered across the forthcoming year, hoping to help her grieve(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to produce and market her invention, the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: When a bumbling movie lover becomes magnetized while attempting to sabotage a local power plant and accidentally erases all of the videotapes in the small video store where his best friend works, the pair attempt to keep the store's loyal customer base by remaking as many of the top-renting movies as possible. Mike (Mos Def) is an employee at Be Kind Rewind, a modest mom and pop video store that is owned by Mr. Fletcher (Danny Glover). Mike's best friend Jerry (Jack Black) works in an auto garage/junkyard directly adjacent to a local power plant. Lately Jerry has become increasingly paranoid about the effects that the power plant is having on his health. Convinced that he has developed a brain tumor from working in such close proximity to the power plant, Jerry attempts to sabotage the plant. Unfortunately for Jerry, his brain is magnetized in the process. The next time Jerry goes to visit Mike at Be Kind Rewind, the powerful magnetization emanating from his brain erases every videotape in the store. Now the only way for Mike and Jerry to be sure that Be Kind Rewind stays in business is to remake every film on the shelves before the customers notice. But when word gets out that Mike and Jerry have remade such Hollywood classics as Back to the Future, Robocop, The Lion King, and Rush Hour without permission, the store is threatened with copyright violations and forced to close its doors. In the aftermath of the closing, Mr. Fletcher and his employees discover just how loyal their customers really are when the entire neighborhood pools their resources to transform the junkyard into a legitimate movie studio and produce an entirely original film detailing the incredible adventures of a local jazz legend(n)

programme.desc: The Huntsman and his secret lover Sara attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest(n)

programme.desc: This reimagining of the Frankenstein mythos focuses on Igor, the assistant of Victor Frankenstein. When the mad scientist builds an undead creature that soon becomes a grave danger, it's up to Igor to save Frankenstein from both the monster and himself(n)

programme.title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
programme.desc: Aided by a young journalist, a woman searches for clues about her mother, who died of cancer in 1951 but not before samples of healthy and cancerous tissues were secretly harvested from her and subsequently used for medical research for decades to come. Based on Rebecca Skloot's best-selling book that took 10 years to research and write(n)

programme.title: Unfaithful
programme.desc: Diane Lane is a wayward wife and Richard Gere is her suspicious husband in Adrian Lyne's Unfaithful. Connie (Lane) leaves her suburban home on an errand, venturing into Manhattan during a wicked windstorm. On a trash-strewn Soho street, she literally runs into Paul Martel (Olivier Martinez), a handsome young Frenchman carrying a huge stack of books. Connie has a bad scrape on her knee, and is unable to get a cab, so Paul invites her up to his apartment. Paul is quietly flirtatious as he gives Connie some ice and a bandage for her knee. Connie phones home and explains to her son, Charlie (Erik Per Sullivan), that she's running late. Before she leaves, Paul gives her a book of Persian poetry, The Rubaiyat of Omar Khayyam. She mentions the encounter in passing to Edward (Gere), her husband, but it's clear that she's obsessing about Paul, and soon she's back in the city, with a pretext for calling him up. Soon, they are lovers, and they grow bolder and bolder in their passion. Edward begins to suspect, and eventually gets a private investigator (Dominic Chianese of The Sopranos) to follow Connie. His worst fears confirmed, Edward decides to confront Paul, a decision that will come to haunt him. While the screenplay for Unfaithful is credited to Alvin Sargent (Ordinary People) and William Broyles Jr. (Cast Away), the inspiration for Lyne's film came from Claude Chabrol's acclaimed 1969 film La Femme Infidele(n)

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: From the director of 48 hours, bruce willis stars as a tough, renegade gunslinger in this all-action western(n)

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Policemen have always been the idols of Freddy Heflin. Due to being slightly deaf, Heflin could never pass the physical to become a police officer himself. However, because of his friendly, amiable nature, he's managed to get himself elected Sheriff of a small New Jersey county outside of New York City, and he lives in a town where many NYPD cops also live. Mo Tilden is an Internal Affairs investigator for the NYPD, and his investigation of some crooked cops leads him to this small town, and to Sheriff Freddy Heflin. Heflin begins to help Tilden, and discovers that some of his heroes may have feet of clay..(n)

programme.title: San Francisco 2.0
programme.desc: Filmmaker Alexandra Pelosi returns to the city of her birth to examine the effects of the technology industry on San Francisco's culture, identity, real-estate market, economy, neighborhoods and history, and discusses its past, present and future with politicians, entrepreneurs, journalists, small-business owners and lifelong residents(n)

programme.title: The Family Man
programme.desc: Nicolas Cage discovers that it's a wonderful life in this touching comic fantasy. He plays a rich, ruthless businessman who's shown the life he might have had by a guardian angel (Don Cheadle) who transforms him into a suburban working stiff with a wife (Tea Leoni), kids and minivan. Brett Ratner directed. Jeremy Piven, Saul Rubinek, Josef Sommer, Makenzie Vega(n)

programme.title: Last Week Tonight With John Oliver
programme.desc: 05-07-2017. No additional information is available(n)

programme.title: Speed Racer
programme.desc: A young race-car driver learns the world of auto racing is fixed in this adrenaline-charged, live-action adaptation of the seminal Japanese anime. With the help of his family, he competes in a cross-country rally in order to expose those responsible(n)

programme.title: The Fight Game With Jim Lampley
programme.desc: 04/19/2017. A look back at the March 18 title bouts of pound-for-pound stars Gennady Golovkin and "Chocolatito" Gonzalez; correspondent Melissa Stark travels to the boxing hotbed of Mexico to gauge who is more popular: Canelo Alvarez or Julio Cesar Chavez Jr.; and the latest news and events in the sport(n)

programme.title: How to Be Single
programme.desc: Four women with very different ideas about love and relationships navigate the single life of NYC. Two friends set out on a journey of self-discovery, while a career gal struggles with settling down and an uptight romantic searches for her perfect match(n)

programme.title: Indignation
programme.desc: A young Jewish atheist attends college in 1951 Ohio, where he clashes with the school's established social order and his overbearing parents' hopes for his future. At the same time, he falls for an attractive, complicated classmate named Olivia(n)

programme.title: Road to Perdition
programme.desc: The acclaimed graphic novel from crime writer Max Allan Collins becomes this big budget Dreamworks drama from director Sam Mendes and screenwriter David Self. Tom Hanks stars as Michael Sullivan, a morally conflicted Depression-era hit man committing murder in the name of his employer, John Rooney (Paul Newman). A kindly, aging Irish crime boss who raised Sullivan as his surrogate son, Rooney is affiliated with Al Capone in Chicago and thus wields great power in the "Tri-Cities" of Moline, IL; Rock Island, IL; and Davenport, IA. Curious about his father's mysterious profession, Sullivan's son, Michael Jr. (Tyler Hoechlin), stows away in his father's automobile one night and witnesses the execution of a man at the hands of Sullivan and Rooney's biological son, Connor (Daniel Craig). Although Michael keeps his promise to remain silent about what he's seen, the paranoid and unstable Connor tries to wipe out the entire Sullivan clan anyway, succeeding only in killing Sullivan's wife, Annie (Jennifer Jason Leigh), and youngest son, Peter (Liam Aiken). Enraged at this and another surprise betrayal by the Rooneys, Sullivan embarks on a path of bloody retribution, Michael in tow. Although he intends to leave his boy with relatives in the rural town of Perdition once the coast is clear, he ends up exposing Michael to the goriest aspects of his talents, slaughtering former associates as he dodges contract assassin Maguire (Jude Law) and cripples the cash flow of the Rooney and Capone organizations through a series of bank robberies, attempting to force either mob family to offer up the sequestered Connor as a sacrifice. Inspired by the popular Japanese comic book series Lone Wolf and Cub and based loosely on an episode from the life and career of notorious real-life crime figures John and Connor Looney, Road to Perdition co-stars Stanley Tucci as legendary Chicago mobster Frank Nitti(n)

programme.title: The Leftovers
programme.desc: G'Day Melbourne. Kevin and Nora take a trip to Australia, where she continues to follow the masterminds of an elaborate con, while he is surprised by a face from the past that takes him back to the traumatic events from three years ago(n)

programme.title: Veep
programme.desc: Justice. Selina and her team attend a funeral for a Supreme Court justice; Amy tries to nail down a location for Selina's library; Dan tries to stay on Jane's good side; Jonah finds an issue(n)

programme.desc: The 32nd annual gala honors Joan Baez, Electric Light Orchestra, Journey, Pearl Jam, Tupac Shakur and Yes, and Nile Rodgers receives the Award for Musical Excellence. Taped April 7, 2017, in Brooklyn at the Barclays Center(n)

programme.title: Absolutely Fabulous: The Movie
programme.desc: In this hysterical big-screen continuation of the popular British sitcom, hard-living ladies Edina and Patsy flee to the French Riviera after they accidentally cause the death of a celebrity at a posh party(n)

programme.title: Batman
programme.desc: After a young boy witnesses his parents' murder on the streets of Gotham City, he grows up to become Batman, a mysterious figure in the eyes of Gotham's citizens. He emerges out of the shadows when the Joker a horribly disfigured individual appears. But the identity of the 'bat' is unknown(n)

programme.title: Bicentennial Man
programme.desc: Comedy, sci-fi, drama and romance combine in this feel-good fantasy directed by Chris Columbus. Robin Williams shines (literally) as an android named Andrew, a handy-robotman who develops human emotions over the centuries. Sam Neill, Embeth Davidtz, Oliver Platt(n)

programme.title: P.S. I Love You
programme.desc: Director Richard LaGravenese's romantic drama stars Hilary Swank as Holly Kennedy, a New York real estate agent forced to come to terms with the unexpected death of her young Irish husband Gerry. Before he died, Gerry wrote her a series of letters, to be delivered across the forthcoming year, hoping to help her grieve(n)

programme.title: Joy
programme.desc: Biopic of entrepreneur Joy Mangano, a divorced mother of two who risks her life's savings to produce and market her invention, the Miracle Mop. The success of that product leads to a home-shopping empire and her ascension to matriarch of her family(n)

programme.title: Be Kind Rewind
programme.desc: When a bumbling movie lover becomes magnetized while attempting to sabotage a local power plant and accidentally erases all of the videotapes in the small video store where his best friend works, the pair attempt to keep the store's loyal customer base by remaking as many of the top-renting movies as possible. Mike (Mos Def) is an employee at Be Kind Rewind, a modest mom and pop video store that is owned by Mr. Fletcher (Danny Glover). Mike's best friend Jerry (Jack Black) works in an auto garage/junkyard directly adjacent to a local power plant. Lately Jerry has become increasingly paranoid about the effects that the power plant is having on his health. Convinced that he has developed a brain tumor from working in such close proximity to the power plant, Jerry attempts to sabotage the plant. Unfortunately for Jerry, his brain is magnetized in the process. The next time Jerry goes to visit Mike at Be Kind Rewind, the powerful magnetization emanating from his brain erases every videotape in the store. Now the only way for Mike and Jerry to be sure that Be Kind Rewind stays in business is to remake every film on the shelves before the customers notice. But when word gets out that Mike and Jerry have remade such Hollywood classics as Back to the Future, Robocop, The Lion King, and Rush Hour without permission, the store is threatened with copyright violations and forced to close its doors. In the aftermath of the closing, Mr. Fletcher and his employees discover just how loyal their customers really are when the entire neighborhood pools their resources to transform the junkyard into a legitimate movie studio and produce an entirely original film detailing the incredible adventures of a local jazz legend(n)

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winter's War
programme.desc: The Huntsman and his secret lover Sara attempt to stop Freya the Ice Queen and her evil sister from conquering the forest(n)

programme.title: The Man with Two Brains
programme.desc: Zany horror spoof about a brilliant brain surgeon who falls in love with a female brain stored in a jar. The brain is part of an impressive collection held by a colleague in Austria and, upon learning of his wife's infidelity, the surgeon allows himself to be charmed. Communicating telepathically with one of the specimens in the laboratory, he falls in love - but needs a body to put it in(n)

The teens have their moments of tension and hostility, but all emerge from the experience with a more compassionate understanding of one another(n)

programme.title: Gentlemen Broncos
programme.desc: Napoleon Dynamite director Jared Hess again turns his attention to the theme of the lonely, awkward teenager in this comedy about sci-fi fan Benjamin. Desperately wanting to be a writer, Benjamin asks his favourite author, Dr Ronald Chevalier, for feedback on his work-in-progress manuscript Yeast Lords: The Bronco Years. However, suffering from a severe case of writer's block, Chevalier passes off the novel as his own, starting a chain of events that sets Benjamin out on a mission to prove that the work is his(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2
programme.desc: In this sequel to the 2002 sleeper hit My Big Fat Greek Wedding, Toula (Nia Vardalos) finds her extended family rocked by the revelation that her mother and father were never really married -- which, of course, requires an even bigger Greek wedding so they can officially tie the knot. Meanwhile, Toula struggles to spice up her marriage to Ian (John Corbett), and is heartbroken when her daughter Paris (Elena Kampouris) says she wants to go to a distant college in order to get away from her overbearing clan(n)

While Martha believes she's finally found the perfect guy, their romance is threatened by an FBI agent (Tim Roth) who's hunting her new beau. Her struggle to get comfortable with the subject matter means she's got to confront her own prudishness and educate herself about sex first-hand(n)

programme.title: Rat Race
programme.desc: Gag-meister Jerry Zucker's cracking comedy has a cast to die for. Las Vegas casino owner Donald P Sinclair decides to set up a special event for his highest rollers. Lucky tokens in his slot machines entitle six punters to enter a race across America with $2million as the prize. He'll make a killing on the bets placed on the players while the contestants dash for the cash(n)

programme.title: Airheads
programme.desc: Desperate to get their music heard on the radio, members of a heavy-metal band hold a radio station hostage(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: Back in the late 1970s, author Cameron Crowe banked upon his youthful appearance to pose as a teen-aged high school student. The results of his hands-on research was the revelatory book Fast Times at Ridgemont High, which went on to spectacular success as a theatrical feature. The sociological inner lining of Crowe's book was sacrificed in favor of standard teen-movie dialogue and Animal House-style comedy, but the film is impossible to dislike, and it spawned a legion of future imitators. Ostensibly, the main characters are brother and sister Jennifer Jason Leigh and Judge Reinhold. However, the real breakthrough star is Sean Penn as the perpetually zoned-out Jeff Spicoli. It is Penn who has the film's most famous scene, wherein the decorum of teacher Hand (Ray Walston)'s classroom is interrupted by a pizza delivery. Fast Times at Ridgemont High was spun off into a TV series, the short-lived 1986 weekly Fast Times(n)

programme.title: Robert Klein: The Amorous Busboy of Decatur Avenue
programme.desc: In his eighth HBO special, the comic reflects on humorous events from his childhood, his summer job as a lifeguard in the Catskills, the 1960s sexual revolution and signs of aging. Taped in New York City at the John Jay College Theater(n)

programme.title: Sixteen Candles
programme.desc: On the eve of her sister's wedding, suburban teenager Samantha suffers silently as her family forgets her birthday. Even worse, some total dork keeps propositioning her with sophomoric innuendo when she really craves romantic attention from high-school hunk Jake. Moving from Samantha's family home as it's invaded by outre relatives to a high-school dance where nothing seems to go her way, this bittersweet teen comedy traces the hopes and disappointments not only of Samantha..(n)

Misinterpreting a plane crash as war, they spend the next 35 years entombed there. Their son, Adam, is brought up learning foreign languages, dancing, boxing and playing in the astro-turfed 'back yard'. When he is sent to get supplies from the world above, he meets Eve and, in this romantic comedy, discovers the good and bad sides of 1990s America(n)

programme.title: Disney's The Kid
programme.desc: If you could talk to the child that you used to be, what advice would you give him? That question forms the basis of this comic fantasy. Forty-year-old Russ Duritz (Bruce Willis) is a wealthy and powerful "image consultant" who has made a career out of telling people how to present themselves. But while he's a success in business, he's a failure in life; he's vain, mean-spirited, and hasn't been able to hold onto a marriage (or even a pet dog). One day, Russ is startled to meet Rusty (Spencer Breslin), a stocky kid whom he soon realizes is himself at the age of eight, having passed through a wrinkle in time. Young Rusty doesn't seem much happier than the grown-up Russ, so the older man takes his younger self under his wing and tries to teach him how to avoid the mistakes he's made, while Rusty encourages Russ to be a more caring human being. Along the way, Russ and Rusty become friends, and realize how much they can learn from each other. Disney's The Kid also stars Jean Smart as one of Russ' clients, Lily Tomlin as his assistant, and Daniel Von Bargen as his father(n)

George Clooney is the new caped crusader, aided and abetted by Robin (Chris O'Donnell) and, for the first time in the series, by Batgirl (Alicia Silverstone), a feisty fellow freedom fighter! This time, our heroes must confront Mr Freeze (Arnold Schwarzenegger), a cold-hearted villain with an icy touch who has teamed up with the desirable yet deadly Poison Ivy (Uma Thurman), a woman with a kiss to die for - literally. With the help of his trusty butler Alfred (Michael Gough) and a dazzling array of new gadgets and vehicles, Batman and his partners must put a stop to Ivy and Mr Freeze before they succeed in their plan to conquer the entire world(n)

programme.title: Mom and Dad Save the World
programme.desc: The writers of Bill and Ted's Excellent Adventure have done it again: here's another wacky, wildly irreverent take on the American way of life, this time set in Woodland Hills, California. Dick and Marge Nelson are an average middle-aged couple who have been married for twenty rather uneventful years. Far, far away in a remote corner of the galaxy, the Nelsons are being watched by the paranoid emperor of a tiny planet named Spengo. Tod Spengo has taken a shine to Marge, particularly when she exercises to jazz music in her back yard. Spengo postpones his planned destruction of Earth by one day so that he can lift Marge to safety and then marry her, but what he hasn't counted on is the humans' determination to save their own planet. And, once on Spengo itself, Dick and Marge are in the perfect position to foil the emperor's attempts to annihilate the Earth(n)

programme.title: August Rush
programme.desc: Kirsten Sheridan's family drama stars Freddie Highmore (Charlie from Tim Burton's Charlie and the Chocolate Factory) as Evan Taylor, a musical prodigy searching for his parents. When pregnant cellist Lyla Novacek was hit by a car, her controlling father and manager told her she'd lost the baby; in reality she gave birth prematurely and her father sent the infant to an orphanage. Eleven years later, when Evan finds out that his parents are alive, he sets out to find them, taking inspiration from the music around him. The heart of the film is Evan's almost mystical ability to 'feel' music, a challenging concept that works, thanks to inventive work by main score composer Mark Mancina. August Rush also stars Jonathan Rhys Meyers as Evan's rock singer father, and Robin Williams as a modern day Fagin who Evan meets during his search for his family(n)

programme.title: Zeus and Roxanne
programme.desc: Marine biologist Mary Beth is amused by the friendship which develops between her dolphin Roxanne and a mutt called Zeus. She's even more surprised when she starts to fall for the dog's owner, rock composer Terry(n)

programme.title: Aliens in the Attic
programme.desc: A kids' sci-fi comedy-adventure from director John Shultz, penned by British screenwriter Mark Burton. Teen maths whiz Tom Pearson is on holiday with his extended family at a remote lakeside cottage, where he and the other children make an unexpected discovery: four small, green extra-terrestrial creatures lurking in the loft. The aliens are freshly arrived from outer space and don't waste too much time in setting about their goal - the subjugation of mankind. However, it's equally swiftly apparent that their chosen method of conquest - a mind-control device - only works on adults. And so the scene is set for Tom and the other minors to make a brave stand against the incomers on behalf of Earth's human population(n)

programme.title: The Electric Company
programme.desc: A Fist Full of Confetti. Jessica and Francine compete on Neighborhood Record Day to see who can record the most broken records(n)

programme.title: Dr. Dolittle 3
programme.desc: Maya has inherited her doctor dad's ability to talk to animals, but in the big city, her skills seem weird. She's sent to a western ranch, makes friends and enlists them in a fight to save the farm from ruin(n)

programme.title: El Perro y el Gato
programme.desc: A dog and a cat give vocabulary lessons in English and Spanish(n)

programme.title: The Haunted Mansion
programme.desc: Supernatural comedy and hilarious hauntings as Eddie plays Jim Evers, a greedy real estate agent who gets the chance of a lifetime when he's called to a once magnificent mansion that's for sale. It's his wedding anniversary, so he pretends he's remembered and takes the family along for an outing. But he finds the house inhabited by 999 ghosts, including Edward Gracey, an unhappy spirit who is convinced that Evers' wife holds the key to lifting the curse that has trapped all the ghosts in the house. As he tries to help the ghosts escape from their earthly prison, he learns some valuable lessons about his own failings as a father. Another film based on a famous Disney theme park ride, this is crammed full of superbly spooky special effects and makes great family entertainment(n)

programme.title: The Simpsons Movie
programme.desc: In the hit film based on the television series, Homer must save the world from a catastrophe he himself created. It all begins with Homer, his new pet pig, and a leaky silo full of droppings - a combination that triggers a disaster the likes of which Springfield has never experienced. As Marge is outraged by Homer's monumental blunder, a vengeful mob descends on the Simpson household. The family makes a narrow escape, but is soon divided by both location and conflict(n)

programme.title: The Golden Compass
programme.desc: The adventures of a brave orphan girl who goes on an epic quest in an alternate world to rescue a kidnapped friend(n)

programme.title: The Legend of Tarzan

programme.title: Play Misty for Me
programme.desc: Tense thriller about a radio DJ who becomes the object of a listener's desire which soon turns to fanatical obsession. After a one-night stand, he finds himself pursued by a woman who won't take no for an answer and who goes to increasingly drastic lengths to declare her undying love for him. When these fail, her desire is transformed into an uncontrolled bid for revenge. Clint Eastwood's directorial debut(n)

programme.desc: Three San Francisco girlfriends search for the right guy. Christina dances the nights away and advises her pals to take the first fella going. But when she bumps into Peter in a club, something feels different. Is this really Mr Right? Sassy romcom(n)

programme.title: Hairspray
programme.desc: Adam Shankman's adaptation of the 2002 musical (itself an adaptation of John Waters' 1988 original movie) stars John Travolta, Queen Latifah and Nikki Blonsky. Teen Tracy Turnblad's (Blonsky) regular cultural highlight is a local television music-and-dance programme called The Corny Collins Show. And, like all her friends, she dreams of having a chance to appear on it. However, this is Baltimore and it is 1962 - and Tracy's both overweight and, worse, has liberal attitudes to race relations, which don't sit comfortably with the segregationist views of the show's producer (Michelle Pfeiffer). But could Tracy's ambitions for not only appearing on the show, but also racially integrating it, receive a fillip when she meets the son of Motormouth Maybelle (Latifah), host of the monthly 'Negro Day' edition of the show? Also starring John Travolta (in drag and a fat-suit) as Tracy's mum, Christopher Walken as her dad, Amanda Bynes, James Marsden, Brittany Snow, Zac Efron and Elijah Kelley; plus cameos from the star of the original movie, Ricki Lake, and its director, John Waters(n)

programme.title: The Brothers Grimm
programme.desc: Will Grimm and his brother Jake Grimm earn their living by travelling from village to village and vanquishing strange supernatural beasts that have been menacing the populace. Or at least that's what their clients think has been happening; as it happens, Will and Jake are confidence men who cleverly stage the ghostly attacks and then take payment for making the creatures they fabricated go away(n)

programme.title: Phantasm II
programme.desc: Sequel in which two young men find themselves up against a horrifying plot by the Tall Man to capture both dead and sleeping people and turn them into ugly gnome-like creatures(n)

programme.title: Mystic River
programme.desc: Academy Award winner Clint Eastwood directs Sean Penn and Tim Robbins in Oscar-winning performances in this tale of a seemingly senseless murder ... and how the tragedy reawakens the buried trauma of a long-ago crime. In Boston 25 years ago, 11-year-old Dave Boyle unwittingly gets into a car with two strangers. When he returns four days later, Dave is different in a way that destroys his friendship with Sean Devine and Jimmy Marcus. Now Sean's (Kevin Bacon) a cop, Jimmy's (Sean Penn) a neighborhood store owner with a prison record and mob connections, and Dave's (Tim Robbins) trying hard to keep his demons safely submerged. But when Jimmy's daughter is murdered, each of the men must confront a past that none wants to acknowledge. As the investigation tightens around these three, an ominous story unfolds--of friendship, family and innocence lost too soon(n)

programme.title: Cop Land
programme.desc: Policemen have always been the idols of Freddy Heflin. Due to being slightly deaf, Heflin could never pass the physical to become a police officer himself. However, because of his friendly, amiable nature, he's managed to get himself elected Sheriff of a small New Jersey county outside of New York City, and he lives in a town where many NYPD cops also live. Mo Tilden is an Internal Affairs investigator for the NYPD, and his investigation of some crooked cops leads him to this small town, and to Sheriff Freddy Heflin. Heflin begins to help Tilden, and discovers that some of his heroes may have feet of clay..(n)

programme.title: The Number 23
programme.desc: Jim Carrey and Virginia Madsen star in this dark psychological thriller from director Joel Schumacher (The Phantom of the Opera, Batman & Robin). Walter Sparrow is leading a contented life until his wife Agatha innocently gives him a battered old paperback as a gift. As he reads, Sparrow is astonished by the parallels between his life and that of the novel's protagonist, Fingerling. But as the plot progresses it grows darker, featuring themes of transgressive sex, suicide and murder. It also hinges around Fingerling's obsession with the number 23 - a prime number that seems to pop up everywhere in the universe once you start to notice it. It's not long before 23 takes a similar hold on Sparrow. And, when he begins unjustly to view Agatha in the same distrustful light that Fingerling views his own spouse Fabrizia, it seems as if Sparrow has locked on to the same tragic trajectory as the story's lead character. Or can he find a way to wrench himself from the novel's grip?(n)

She's also an overbearing matriarch who has a difficult time dealing with her son's budding love affair with an attractive and likable young lady (Emma Booth), whom she sees as a threat to their not-so-perfect family life. Khan Chittenden is superb as the lad-in-love. Directed by Cherie Nowlan(n)

programme.title: Real Time With Bill Maher
programme.sub-title: John Kasich; Gabriel Sherman; Philip Mudd; George Packer; Maya Wiley
programme.desc: John Kasich; Gabriel Sherman; Philip Mudd; George Packer; Maya Wiley. Ohio governor John Kasich and journalist Gabriel Sherman are the interview guests. The panelists are intelligence analyst Philip Mudd, journalist George Packer and civil rights activist Maya Wiley(n)

programme.title: Victor Manuelle: Que Suenen los Tambores
programme.desc: Salsa sensation Victor Manuelle performs in this concert experience featuring his biggest hits(n)

programme.title: Heaven Help Us
programme.desc: Charles Purpura scribed this semi-autobiographical tale about his experiences in a Brooklyn Catholic school of 1965. The film focuses on several Catholic school boys who get into ever increasing amounts of trouble with the presiding priests of the Catholic school, St. Basil's. Andrew McCarthy plays Michael Dunn, a newly arrived student who latches onto the class egghead Caesar (Malcolm Danare), who is constantly picked on by the class bully Rooney (Kevin Dillon). Rooney intimidates Michael and Caesar to become his erstwhile chums and, along with a few other quiet students, they receive corporal punishment for minor infractions, disrupting communion and confession and, ultimately, their antics inspire changes in the strict school hierarchy(n)

programme.title: The English Patient
programme.desc: Sweeping romantic epic, set at the end of World War II, in which a badly burnt and unidentified pilot recounts to the nurse tending him the story of a doomed love affair with a colleague's wife. Adapted from Michael Ondaatje's Booker Prize-winning novel, the film won nine Oscars, including Best Picture, Director and Supporting Actress(n)

programme.title: Flashpoint
programme.desc: Bob Logan (Kris Kristofferson) and Ernie Wyatt (Treat Williams) are freewheeling U.S. border patrol officers in a tiny Texas town. Though they're "oil and water" in terms of personality, they're a dynamite team on the job. Coming across a million dollars in stolen money, their relationship threatens to unravel. Upright Wyatt is all for turning in the money, but Logan has other ideas. Soon, however, they're reunited against several common enemies, including a team of overzealous FBI agents. Flashpoint is based on a novel by George La Founteine(n)

programme.title: Immigration Tango
programme.desc: Love crosses international boundaries and makes a big mess en route in this romantic comedy. Carlos Sanchez (Carlos Leon) is from Latin America, and Elena Dubrovnik (Elika Portnoy) is from Russia. Carlos and Elena are in love and living in the United States, but while they'd like to stay, they have a problem -- their visas are soon to expire, and they aren't sure when or if they'll be able to get green cards that will allow them permanent residence. Carlos and Elena are close friends with Mike White (McCaleb Burnett) and Betty Bristol (Ashley Wolfe), who were born and raised in the States. Like Carlos and Elena, Mike and Betty are planning to marry but haven't done so yet, and when they learn of their friends' dilemma, someone comes up with a solution -- Carlos will marry Betty, Mike will marry Elena, and once their respective green cards come through, both couples will divorce and everyone lives happily ever after. However, the plan doesn't go as smoothly as expected -- suspicious immigration agents are keeping a close watch on Carlos and Elena, so the newlyweds have to live with their respective spouses and act happily married in order to maintain the illusion of matrimony, which leads the four friends into a variety of romantic complications. Immigration Tango received its world premiere at the 2010 Boston International Film Festival(n)

programme.title: Miami Rhapsody
programme.desc: The discovery of marital troubles in her well-to-do Jewish family causes a young woman to question her own upcoming nuptials(n)

programme.title: Demolition

programme.title: The Sixth Sense

programme.title: Beautiful Creatures
programme.desc: Lena has just moved to the small, Southern town of Gatlin, where the only person who seems to understand her -- or dream of bigger places or ideas -- is a cute guy named Ethan Wate (Alden Ehrenreich), who recognizes her instantly from the cryptic dreams he's been having every night. Lena is an orphan, and she's come to stay with her mysterious uncle, Macon Ravenwood (Irons), the patriarch of her powerful family. Powerful, because The Ravenwood clan are Casters, born with powers that ordinary mortals don't have, like the ability to move objects, control the elements, and even step out of normal space and time to communicate only with each other. But just as Lena feels ready to open up to Ethan, she discovers that their love is in imminent danger, because when female Casters turn 16, their destiny as either good or evil is revealed. Unwilling to let her nature be dictated by forces outside her control, Lena and Ethan set out together to uncover the strange, secret lore of their families' intertwined histories dating back to the Civil War, and figure out how to grant Lena the power to choose her own destiny(n)

programme.title: My Big Fat Greek Wedding 2

programme.title: The Departed
programme.desc: Legendary director Martin Scorsese takes the helm for this tale of questionable loyalties and blurring identities set in the South Boston organized crime scene and inspired by the wildly popular 2002 Hong Kong crime film Infernal Affairs. As the police force attempts to reign in the increasingly powerful Irish mafia, authorities are faced with the prospect of sending in an undercover agent or seeing their already frail grip on the criminal underworld slip even further. Billy Costigan (Leonardo DiCaprio) is a young cop looking to make a name for himself in the world of law enforcement. Collin Sullivan (Matt Damon) is a street-smart criminal who has successfully infiltrated the police department with the sole intention of reporting their every move to ruthless syndicate head Frank Costello (Jack Nicholson). When Costigan is assigned the task of working his way into Costello's tightly guarded inner circle, Sullivan is faced with the responsibility of rooting out the informer before things get out of hand. With the stakes constantly rising and time quickly running out for the undercover cop and his criminal counterpart, each man must work feverishly to reveal his counterpart before his identity is exposed by the other. Martin Sheen, Alec Baldwin, and Ray Winstone co-star, and writer William Monahan adapts a screenplay originally penned by Alan Mak and Felix Chong(n)

programme.title: Final Destination 3
programme.desc: (2006) James Wong, who directed the first film in the horror franchise, returned for this sequel. Mary Elizabeth Winstead plays Wendy Christensen, who has a premonition that the roller coaster she and her school friends are on is going to crash. Sure enough, after they get off, there is a spectacular, satisfyingly gory crash. But once again, Death will not be cheated of his due and, as the survivors succumb one by one in suitably ingenious ways (the tanning salon incident is particularly worth catching), Wendy and her friend Kevin Fischer (Ryan Merriman) try to work out who is next and how they'll escape(n)

programme.title: The Final Destination
programme.desc: In the fourth installment of the Final Destination series, another group of friends try to dodge The Reaper, this time in a car race. Right after they leave, a terrible accident causes the death of dozens of people, confirming his shocking premonition. Meanwhile, spa worker Kelly, the new girl, copes with being away from home for the first time. Narrated by John Thomson.(n)

programme.title: Love Your Garden
programme.desc: The green-fingered team returns with more surprise garden makeovers for deserving people across the nation. Darren and Lesley Chan's youngest daughter Amelie was born with Charge syndrome - a debilitating genetic condition that has left her deaf, partially sighted and in need of constant care. Alan Titchmarsh sets out to transform the Manchester family's neglected outdoor space, calling in David Domoney, Frances Tophill and Katie Rushworth to introduce sensory planting for the 10-year-old, a shade-loving border and a multifunction pathway made from areas of decking, artificial turf and paving.(n)

Bradley Walsh, Jamie Bamber and Bill Paterson star.(n)

programme.desc: Scott Cozens and Sheldon Smithens uncover a collection of mining memorabilia and the complete works of jazz artist Dave Brubeck on vinyl at Six Mall Cross.(n)

programme.desc: The guys are excited by some original Star Trek props, and they also scrutinise a postcard signed by boxer Jack Johnson. Meanwhile, Chum considers getting a desk.(n)

programme.desc: Crystal pressures Joyce to sort things out after the pool is contaminated with weedkiller and all guests have to be evacuated, so she hastily arranges a trip to the circus, but Andre the circus manager fails to tell her that the acts are not available. However, Bean, Mateo and Jacqueline come to the rescue and use their connections to help Joyce put on their own evening of show-stopping entertainment. Last in the series.(n)

programme.desc: A promoter is killed at a rave party while handing out legal enhancing drugs and Riggs and Murtaugh soon find themselves in a violent turf war between a new generation of drug dealers and a Koreatown gang. The growing friction between the duo is relieved somewhat when Murtaugh is assigned a temporary new partner, while Trish attempts to set Riggs up with a date by pairing him with one of her co-workers. Action drama based on the film series, starring Clayne Crawford and Damon Wayans.(n)

programme.title: Better Late Than Never
programme.desc: New series. Actors Henry Winkler and William Shatner, pro football star Terry Bradshaw and former heavyweight boxing champion George Foreman take the journey of a lifetime, traveling across Asia with comedian Jeff Dye as their sidekick and guide. The first stop is Tokyo, where they are immediately fish out of water and cannot even find their way out of the train station.(n)

programme.title: Bear Grylls: Mission Survive
programme.desc: The five remaining celebrities are deep in the heart of the African bush, and with rations running low, Bear challenges them to choose from a selection of edible flora. But while some is a vital source of sustenance, others could kill them. After this, expedition leader Meg Hine pretends to be seriously injured and losing blood. The celebrities have only 40 minutes to make a stretcher and carry her over scrubland to the extraction point. Can they make it before Meg `dies' of organ failure? Finally, the group arrive at their new camp, but there is one last challenge - an assault course - before Bear decides who to send home.(n)

programme.title: Kavanagh QC
programme.desc: A family GP is accused of murdering his wife, and Kavanagh, back in chambers following compassionate leave, is assigned to his defence. As the trial progresses, the battling barrister gradually comes to realise just how much he has in common with his client. Also starring Tom Courtenay, Oliver Ford Davies, Nicholas Jones and Valerie Edmond.(n)

programme.title: Peak Practice
programme.desc: David manages to persuade his family to come and live with him in Cardale, but his happiness is marred by the discovery that a boy he helped deliver 11 years ago has contracted a potentially fatal illness. Will and Kate are still finding it hard to come to terms with baby Emily's condition and consider moving further afield, while new receptionist Joanne reckons Andrew could be ripe for romance. Starring Simon Shepherd, Saskia Wickham, Gary Mavers, Adrian Lukis and Shelagh McLeod.(n)

programme.title: The Chief

programme.title: Heartbeat

Rural police drama, starring Nick Berry, Juliette Gruber, William Simons and Bill Maynard.(n)

programme.title: The Chief

programme.desc: Robert feels Christine is keeping him at arm's length, while Cathy needs his shoulder to cry on after a weekend in London with Mike leaves her with mixed feelings about their on-off relationship. programme.desc: A Belgian film star arrives in London and summons her friend Poirot to unravel the mysterious threats she has been receiving, which demand the return of a priceless diamond, the Western Star. Rosalind Bennett guest stars.(n)
