programme.title: Major League
programme.desc: Baseball comedy following a team of bungling amateurs and over-the-hill athletes through an unexpected winning streak. When a former chorus girl inherits the ownership of the Cleveland Indians from her deceased husband, she deliberately puts together a bad team in an attempt to relocate them to Miami. But, against all odds, the team begins winning matches. A sequel followed in 1994(n)

programme.title: The Meddler
programme.desc: After the death of her husband, a woman named Marnie relocates to L.A. to be closer to her daughter Lori, a Hollywood screenwriter. While Lori frets about her mom's smothering ways, Marnie keeps getting involved in the lives of others: She dates an ex-cop, helps an Apple Store employee study for school and pays for a lesbian wedding(n)

programme.title: The Boxer
programme.desc: Danny Flynn is released from prison in Belfast after fourteen years for his part in IRA activities. He is determined to avoid the bloodshed that was inherent in his political past and to build a new life in his old home. He starts a gym to train young boxers like himself, with no political or sectarian ties, and renews his relationship with the woman he left behind when imprisoned. But his relationship to the past refuses to let him live a life of peace(n)

programme.title: Saawariya
programme.desc: The tale of the ill-fated romance between artist Raj, who finds the fulfilment of his soul's yearning when he enters one of the most picturesque rural hamlets in India, and his lover, Sakina, a mysterious young woman whom he spots standing on a bridge. With English subtitles(n)

programme.title: Catch a Fire
programme.desc: Based on the true-story of Patrick Chamusso, a South African oil refinery foreman who was unfairly arrested as a suspect when the refinery was sabotaged(n)

programme.title: Love Is All You Need
programme.desc: A widowed Englishman and a Danish hairdresser who's been left by her husband forge a fragile romance during a trip to Italy to see their son and daughter get married(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young woman longing to start a family becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist co-worker and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: Signs
programme.desc: As alien beings threaten Earth's cities, former preacher Graham Hess and his family retreat into their farmhouse and prepare for a very close encounter. Thriller(n)

programme.title: Jarhead
programme.desc: A young man gets a crash course in the madness of war in this fact-based drama from director Sam Mendes. Anthony "Swoff" Swofford (Jake Gyllenhaal) decides to join the Marines, just like his father and his father before him, and signs on just in time to be sent to Iraq to fight in the Gulf War in 1991. After experiencing the rigors of boot camp, Swofford and his pal Troy (Peter Sarsgaard) are trained to be snipers, and under the leadership of Sgt. Sykes (Jamie Foxx) and Lt. Col. Kazinski (Chris Cooper), the two land in the middle of a desert where they're up against an enemy they can't always see under a blazing sun with hours of boredom punctuated by moments of sheer terror. Swofford, Troy, and their fellow soldiers rely on the wits, their sense of humor, and their friendship of their brothers in arms to deal with a situation that doesn't much resemble what they saw on television at home. Jarhead was based on the memoirs of the real-life Anthony Swofford, who did serve as a sniper in the 1991 Gulf War; the title comes from military slang for a Marine enlistee(n)

programme.title: City Island
programme.desc: A dysfunctional New York family find their web of secrets and lies exacerbated by the arrival of a mysterious house guest. Comedy(n)

programme.title: Jack Goes Boating
programme.desc: In this poignant comedy-drama, quirky loners Jack (Philip Seymour Hoffman) and Connie are fixed up on a date by a married couple. As their new relationship begins to make their troubled lives better, Jack takes swim lessons in order to give Connie her dream date on a boat. Meanwhile, the couple who brought them together finds their marriage falling apart. Directed by Philip Seymour Hoffman(n)

programme.title: Maggie's Plan
programme.desc: A young woman longing to start a family becomes involved in a complicated love triangle with a struggling novelist co-worker and his haughty theorist wife(n)

programme.title: Sunshine Cleaning
programme.desc: A single mom struggling to make ends meet persuades her slacker sister to go into the crime-scene-cleanup business to make some quick cash. Amy Adams and Emily Blunt star in this quirky, well-acted dramedy from the producers of "Little Miss Sunshine." Alan Arkin, Jason Spevack, Steve Zahn. Directed by Christine Jeffs(n)

programme.title: The Runaways
programme.desc: Biopic about the tumultuous relationship between Joan Jett and Cherie Currie during their years with the Runaways, an all-female 1970s rock band that took the world by storm(n)

programme.title: Smashed
programme.desc: In this riveting drama, an alcoholic couple are torn apart when the wife decides to get sober in order to keep her job as an elementary-school teacher and repair her relationship with her mother(n)

programme.title: Easy Rider
programme.desc: Cult classic road movie that shot Jack Nicholson to fame, directed by and starring Dennis Hopper. Two hippy bikers, Wyatt and Billy, drop out of society and head across America in an attempt to find themselves and their country(n)

programme.title: The Story of Us
programme.desc: Bruce Willis and Michelle Pfeiffer star in this romantic comedy as Ben and Katie Jordan, a couple who have been married for fifteen years. They have two great kids, a nice home, and a comfortable life, but somewhere down the line, the spark went out of their marriage, and they find that they don't really love each other anymore. With their relationship at a crossroads, Ben and Katie, two different people who have never felt more different, have to decide if they want to try to salvage their marriage, or if it's time to move on. The Story of Us was directed by Rob Reiner, and features Julie Hagerty, Tim Matheson, Paul Reiser, Tom Poston, Rita Wilson, and Jayne Meadows(n)

programme.title: Chicken With Plums
programme.desc: A talented musician becomes depressed and lies in bed awaiting his own death after his beloved violin is destroyed. Later, he experiences flashbacks to his past and visions of his children's futures(n)

programme.title: The Company
programme.desc: Neve Campbell stars as a talented young dancer attempting to make the grade at the prestigious Joffrey Ballet of Chicago. Also starring James Franco and Malcolm McDowell(n)

programme.title: I'm So Excited!
programme.desc: The passengers and crew of an airliner find their lives in jeopardy due to a technical failure, and experience a collective catharsis that helps to ward off the specter of death as the pilots work to land the plane safely in this wild comedy(n)

programme.title: Chico & Rita
programme.desc: A love affair between two musicians spans six decades and numerous countries and political regimes in this animated romantic drama. In 1948, Chico (voice of Eman Xor Ona) is a hotshot jazz pianist living in Havana, where his reputation as a ladies' man nearly outshines his talent at the keyboard. One night, Chico sees Rita (voice of Limara Meneses) singing "Love for Sale" at a nightclub, and it's love at first sight, though Rita is put off by the fact Chico already has a steady girl. However, when Chico backs Rita during a talent competition held at a Havana radio station, she realizes they're musically simpatico, and her heart soon follows her creative instincts. But after a quarrel with Chico, Rita is approach by Ron, an American talent scout who says he can make her a star, and she takes him up on the offer, traveling with him to New York. Not wanting to lose Rita, Chico and his best friend Ramon head to New York City, but as Rita achieves fame and fortune in the United States, Chico finds the limelight is keeping them apart, and after returning to Cuba, the island's unstable political climate proves even better than Ron at keeping him away from Rita. Chico y Rita (aka Chico and Rita) was a collaboration between filmmaker and music producer Fernando Trueba, artist and designer Javier Mariscal, and animator and director Tono Errando, and features cartoon "cameo appearances" from a number of legendary jazz artists, including Charlie Parker, Dizzy Gillespie, and Chano Pozo(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: The Pretender. The York princesses are married off to strengthen the Tudor cause; King Henry finds himself back on the battlefield to protect his reign; and Lizzie learns that threats they face may be closer to home(n)

programme.title: All the King's Men
programme.desc: Sean Penn explodes off the screen in this gripping remake of the 1949 Best Picture Oscar winner. The film chronicles the rise and fall of ruthless Louisiana politician Willie Stark (Penn), who was based on Depression-era demagogue Huey Long. Written and directed by Steve Zaillian, who adapted Robert Penn Warren's 1946 Pulitzer Prize-winning novel. Political consultant James Carville is one of the executive producers. Jude Law, Kate Winslet, Mark Ruffalo, Patricia Clarkson, Anthony Hopkins(n)

programme.title: Valkyrie
programme.desc: Based on actual events, ¿Valkyrie¿ goes back to the Nazi Germany during WWII as the tide turns in favor of the Allies. A proud military man, Colonel Claus von Stauffenberg (Tom Cruise) desperately plots to topple the Nazi regime before the nation is crushed in a near-inevitable defeat. Realizing that time is running out, he decides that he must take action himself and joins the German resistance. Armed with a cunning strategy to use Hitler's own emergency plan - known as Operation Valkyrie - von Stauffenberg and his men plot to assassinate the dictator and overthrow his Nazi government from the inside(n)

programme.title: Oscar and Lucinda
programme.desc: Languid adaptation of Peter Carey's novel about a pair of mismatched 19th-century lovers, a gambling minister and a plucky heiress(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: The Pretender. The York princesses are married off to strengthen the Tudor cause; King Henry finds himself back on the battlefield to protect his reign; and Lizzie learns that threats they face may be closer to home(n)

programme.title: The Young Victoria
programme.desc: A romantic dramatisation of Queen Victoria as a troubled teenage monarch cursed by opportunist hangers-on and manipulative advisors, but blessed with the love of her cousin Prince Albert. Casting Queen Victoria in a new light, the political machinations of court are explored as her romantic relationship with Prince Albert develops alongside. A period drama portraying the Queen's early, turbulent reign through her gathering stature as a queen who would rule for 63 years(n)

programme.title: The White Princess
programme.desc: The Pretender. The York princesses are married off to strengthen the Tudor cause; King Henry finds himself back on the battlefield to protect his reign; and Lizzie learns that threats they face may be closer to home(n)

programme.title: Son of Saul
programme.desc: Saul, a Hungarian prisoner, is assigned to burn the corpses of his own people in one of the Auschwitz Crematoriums. He finds moral survival when he tries to secure a proper Jewish burial of his son(n)

programme.title: She Hate Me
programme.desc: Spike Lee's keen eye for social satire is evident in this comedy about an unemployed executive (Anthony Mackie) who discovers he can make a living impregnating lesbians who want children. Kerry Washington, Ellen Barkin, Monica Bellucci, Jim Brown, Ossie Davis(n)

programme.title: Robert Klein Still Can't Stop His Leg
programme.desc: The life and career of comedian Robert Klein are the focus of this documentary, which includes interviews with Jerry Seinfeld, Jon Stewart, Richard Lewis and more(n)

programme.title: The Truth About Cats & Dogs
programme.desc: A radio chat-show host agrees to go out with a caller when the two hit it off while chatting on the show, but insecurities lead her to convince a model who lives next-door to go out on the date instead of her. She has to come clean with her dream man before he falls for the model(n)

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: A small-town robot goes to the big city to be an inventor. An eye-popping computer-animated comedy(n)

programme.title: Loser
programme.desc: A geeky, sweet-natured university student finds his dim world brightening when he meets a grungy coed, who teaches him how to fit in(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: Bulletproof Monk
programme.desc: An ageless monk guards a sacred scroll that can grant its readers the power to rule the world. With the help of a cocky pickpocket, the monk battles a Nazi who's trying to seize control of the artifact(n)

programme.title: Jumanji
programme.desc: Robin Williams stars as Alan Parrish, who as a young boy discovers the mysterious board game Jumanji. When he sits down to play with his reluctant friend Sarah, strange things begin to happen. On the roll of the dice, Alan is transported into another world - the jungle realm of Jumanji - where he remains trapped for nearly 26 years. Decades later, when two new children, Judy and Peter, begin to play the game in the attic of Alan's childhood home, Alan is freed from the jungle world and emerges as a 38 year old survivor of the dangerous game. Together, the three reluctant players must find the now grown Sarah to finish the game before the game finishes them(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the "maid" of honor in her upcoming wedding in this romantic comedy starring Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom (Dempsey) and Hannah (Monaghan) have been best friends for years. Though all the hard times, Hannah has been the one constant in Tom's life, and the one person he knows he can always rely on. When Hannah leaves for a six-week business trip in Scotland, Tom is surprised to realize how truly lonely he is without her. Life just isn't the same without Hannah around, so the moment she returns, Tom resolves to ask for her hand in marriage. But apparently Hannah's trip wasn't all business, because upon returning home Hannah announces that she has gotten engaged to a dashing Scotsman and will soon be starting a new life overseas. She's convinced that Tom will be thrilled for her, and wants him to play a crucial role in the wedding. His spirits crushed but his love for Hannah stronger than ever before, Tom reluctantly agrees to be the "maid" of honor so that he can prove his love in no uncertain terms and convince her to call off the wedding before true happiness slips through his fingers(n)

programme.title: Robots
programme.desc: A small-town robot goes to the big city to be an inventor. An eye-popping computer-animated comedy(n)

programme.title: The Good Dinosaur
programme.desc: In this enchanting computer-animated fantasy, set in a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct, an amiable young Apatosaurus befriends a prehistoric human child as he embarks on a journey to reunite with his family(n)

programme.title: Loser
programme.desc: A geeky, sweet-natured university student finds his dim world brightening when he meets a grungy coed, who teaches him how to fit in(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: 40 Days and 40 Nights
programme.desc: Josh Hartnett gives up girls and swears off sex for Lent in this romantic comedy. But keeping his vow will be tricky after he meets dream girl Shannyn Sossamon(n)

programme.title: Frenemy
programme.desc: An ongoing philosophical conversation provides a backdrop for a deadly game of cat and mouse in this comedy-drama from filmmaker Gregory Dark. Mr. Jack (Matthew Modine) and Sweet Stephen (Callum Blue) are two men who spend their days wandering the streets of Los Angeles and chatting. Jack and Stephen enjoy talking about the big questions of life -- love, hate, violence and mortality -- but their conversations are not quite what they seem to be on the surface. Mr. Jack is actually a hired killer and Sweet Stephen is his conscience, and as they explore the City of Angels they frequently pass the bodies of women Jack has murdered. As the body count rises as Jack and Stephen ponder the imponderable, Tommy (Adam Baldwin), a police detective with a renegade streak, is on the trail of the killer. Little Fish, Strange Pond also stars Zach Galifianakis, Liza Weil and Paul Adelstein; the film was an official selection at the 2010 Cinequest Film Festival(n)

programme.title: happythankyoumoreplease
programme.desc: Commitment-phobic writer Sam unofficially adopts a boy abandoned by his parents, but this leads to complications when Sam's newest girlfriend, Mississippi, wants to move in with him(n)

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a young woman (Kat Dennings) who, to put off an annoying classmate, recruits a musician (Michael Cera) to be her boyfriend for an evening that turns out to be quite eventful. Alexis Dziena. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: The Kids Are All Right
programme.desc: The son of a same-sex couple seeks out the sperm donor who made his birth possible in this comedy from writer/director Lisa Cholodenko. The committed parents of two teenage children, Nic (Annette Bening) and Jules (Julianne Moore), are about to send their daughter, Joni (Mia Wasikowska), off to college when her younger brother, Laser (Josh Hutcherson), asks for her help in tracking down his biological father. Reluctantly inquiring with the sperm bank, Joni leaves her number so the office can pass it along to Laser's father. Enthusiastic at the thought of meeting his long lost offspring, Paul (Mark Ruffalo) musters the courage to reach out, and the family tree grows a new branch(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: An cranky septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: Made of Honor
programme.desc: A handsome and successful bachelor is taken aback when his dream girl asks him to be the "maid" of honor in her upcoming wedding in this romantic comedy starring Patrick Dempsey and Michelle Monaghan. Tom (Dempsey) and Hannah (Monaghan) have been best friends for years. Though all the hard times, Hannah has been the one constant in Tom's life, and the one person he knows he can always rely on. But apparently Hannah's trip wasn't all business, because upon returning home Hannah announces that she has gotten engaged to a dashing Scotsman and will soon be starting a new life overseas. She's convinced that Tom will be thrilled for her, and wants him to play a crucial role in the wedding. His spirits crushed but his love for Hannah stronger than ever before, Tom reluctantly agrees to be the "maid" of honor so that he can prove his love in no uncertain terms and convince her to call off the wedding before true happiness slips through his fingers(n)

programme.title: What's the Worst That Could Happen?
programme.desc: This polished caper comedy, based on a Donald E. Westlake novel, pits a professional thief (Martin Lawrence) against the white-collar criminal (Danny DeVito) who stole a prized ring from him. The topnotch supporting cast includes John Leguizamo as Lawrence's partner in crime and comedian Bernie Mac as Lawrence's fence, Uncle Jack. Carmen Ejogo, Glenne Headly, William Fichtner, Larry Miller(n)

programme.title: Irrational Man
programme.desc: Nothing can snap a philosophy professor (Joaquin Phoenix) out of a mental funk, except for a student (Emma Stone) whose presence offers a breath of fresh air(n)

programme.title: Grandma
programme.desc: An cranky septuagenarian poet is drawn back into the lives of her workaholic daughter and teenage granddaughter when the latter asks for her help in dealing with an unplanned pregnancy(n)

programme.title: The Kids Are All Right

programme.title: Nick & Norah's Infinite Playlist
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a young woman (Kat Dennings) who, to put off an annoying classmate, recruits a musician (Michael Cera) to be her boyfriend for an evening that turns out to be quite eventful. Alexis Dziena. Directed by Peter Sollett(n)

programme.title: No Pay, Nudity
programme.desc: A struggling, aging actor must overcome personal and professional strife as he tries to make it and land a career breakthrough(n)

programme.title: Deuce Bigalow: European Gigolo
programme.desc: Deuce Bigalow (Rob Schneider) goes to Amsterdam and meets up with pal TJ Hicks (Eddie Griffin). Joining the gigolo industry once again, he must try and solve a murder TJ's been accused of(n)

programme.title: Cadillac Records
programme.desc: Music biopic set in 1940s Chicago, documenting the story of Polish immigrant Leonard Chess who set up the record label Cadillac Records. The label brought a string of talented black artists into the mainstream, the money began to roll in. As their success grew however, trouble was brewing behind the scenes(n)

programme.title: Jumpin' at the Boneyard
programme.desc: Tim Roth is Manny, unemployed, divorced and with a kid. The last thing he needs is his young brother Danny (Alexis Arquette), a crack addict, turning up after three years. Jeff Stanzler's film, set over 24 hours, shows brotherly love sometimes tests the limits of the soul(n)

programme.title: Eye for an Eye
programme.desc: After the assault, rape and murder of her 17 year old daughter at home, Karen becomes obsessed with putting the rapist behind bars. What Karen soon finds is that the criminal justice system is more interested in procedure than justice and soon frees the killer of her daughter on a vague technicality. Karen finds that she has no options but to proceed with her own plans for justice as the system has again failed to protect the innocent and the victims(n)

programme.title: Machine Gun Preacher
programme.desc: A former biker and drug dealer single-handedly takes on the nefarious Lord's Resistance Army in a noble bid to save young Sudanese refugees from a life of violence and suffering. Inspired by actual events, Marc Forster's Machine Gun Preacher stars Gerard Butler as Sam Childers, a tough-as-nails biker whose heart shatters upon witnessing the harrowing plight of children in Sudan. Determined that no child shall be enslaved by the brutal Lord's Resistance Army, Childers turns to God for inspiration, and establishes an orphanage for wounded kids and child soldiers. When the Lord's Resistance Army refuses to stand down, Childers organizes a militia to protect the children. In helping to give the orphans of war-torn Sudan a better future, the former outlaw begins to find new meaning in his own life as well(n)

programme.title: Fresh
programme.desc: Justifiably hailed as one of the most powerful and innovative films of 1994, screenwriter Boaz Yakin's directorial debut offers a wrenching portrait of a 12-year-old African American boy struggling to survive in a Brooklyn ghetto. The story unspools slowly with a sprawling, nearly silent panorama of the boy's daily life. Fresh (Sean Nelson in his feature film debut) is first seen walking to school, and but for stopping to pick up a delivery from a local drug dealer, he seems like any other boy. While Fresh may appear young and inexperienced, one look into his intelligent, sensitive but street-hardened eyes shows that he is old beyond his years. Shrewd, hard-working and loyal, Fresh is a taciturn youth, and this earns him the respect of the rival drug dealers for whom he works. Both kingpins have become his mentors, and he seems destined to become just like them. Sometimes, Fresh goes to Washington Square to play chess for money. He is a remarkable player, but is no match for his beer-swilling, unemployable father (Samuel L. Jackson), a world class chess player who never had the chance to compete. A ruthless player, his father gives Fresh invaluable advice about the game's nature and ultimately about life itself. Those words come in handy when a schoolyard crisis prompts Fresh to began planning his cold-blooded, methodical escape from ghetto life. During the film, one waits for the stereotypes, the cartoonish two-dimensional characters, inevitable moralizing against an unjust, oppressive society, and the glorified, graphically violent action sequences punctuated by the pounding beat of angry rap music, but Fresh studiously avoids such cliches. The characters are three-dimensional and presented with little judgment; the drug lords are bad men, but they are also very human. His sister is on a ruinous road, but she is not a purely tragic victim. When violence occurs it is ingloriously swift and ugly. Percussionist Stuart Copeland's soundtrack subtly underscores the action(n)

programme.title: The Night Before
programme.desc: Three childhood friends who get together every Christmas Eve plan one last epic night out to celebrate the end of an era(n)

programme.title: Andron
programme.desc: A group of former slaves in a futuristic society are forced to fight their way out of a deadly maze full of assassins in this science-fiction thriller(n)

programme.title: I, Robot
programme.desc: In 2035, a cop with a deep distrust of artificial intelligence uncovers a conspiracy involving murderous robots on the eve of the biggest household robot deployment in human history(n)

programme.title: This Christmas
programme.desc: An estranged African-American family gathers for a yuletide reunion in Los Angeles(n)

programme.title: They Call Me MISTER Tibbs!
programme.desc: Sidney Poitier stars as Police Lieutenant Virgil Tibbs, who must take on a tough investigation when a top political candidate is accused of murdering a prostitute(n)

programme.title: The Skulls
programme.desc: Joshua Jackson stars in this thriller as a poor undergraduate at an exclusive college who's tapped for a centuries-old secret society, and finds out the hard way that membership does indeed have its privileges. Leslie Bibb, Hill Harper, Paul Walker, Craig T. Nelson, William Petersen(n)

programme.title: Rocky
programme.desc: A club fighter from Philadelphia who moonlights as a collector for a local mobster gets a shot at the big time when the heavyweight champion of the world gives him chance to fight for the belt on America's bicentennial(n)

programme.title: Waiting to Exhale
programme.desc: Uplifting drama about the lives and loves of four African-American women in their thirties. Based on Terry McMillan's bestseller(n)

programme.title: Ghost Dog: The Way of the Samurai
programme.desc: Acclaimed filmmaker Jim Jarmusch wrote and directed this offbeat blend of drama, mysticism and comedy. Forest Whitaker stars as a Zen-like hit man who lives by the ancient code of the Samurai. But he's forced to defend himself when he's betrayed by the eccentric crime family he works for. John Tormey, Henry Silva(n)

programme.title: Deep Impact
programme.desc: Sci-fi blockbuster. Journalist Jenny Lernerat believes she has uncovered a major sex scandal; that is until she's abducted for a secret meeting with the president. There she discovers she's stumbles across the biggest news story ever: a comet is on course to collide with the Earth. A joint US-Russian space mission led by a veteran astronaut tries to blast it off course(n)

programme.title: Philadelphia
programme.desc: Hotshot lawyer Andrew Beckett takes his firm to court when he is sacked shortly after the partners discover he has AIDS(n)

programme.title: American Gods
programme.desc: The Secret of Spoons. Mr. Wednesday recruits for the coming battle, and Shadow Moon travels with him to Chicago, where he engages in a very high-stakes game of checkers with an old Slavic god(n)

programme.title: Marvin's Room
programme.desc: Diane Keaton received a Best Actress nomination for her role in this moving drama as a loving caregiver who must make plans for her elderly father (Hume Cronyn) when she is diagnosed with leukemia. Meryl Streep costars as her estranged sister, a selfish woman with a troubled teen son (Leonardo DiCaprio). Robert De Niro, Gwen Verdon(n)

programme.title: Pixels
programme.desc: When aliens mistake images of 1980s arcade games as a sign of aggression, they attack Earth with evil versions of Pac-Man, Donkey Kong and other video-game characters. In response, the US president asks his old gamer pals to battle the invaders(n)

programme.title: Hercules
programme.desc: Hercules teams up with a sorceress to rescue the woman he loves from a wizard bent on world domination. This adventure also pits the titular mythological figure against giant robot monsters(n)

programme.title: Garfield: A Tail of Two Kitties
programme.desc: Garfield, the world's favourite cat, has begun his very own British Invasion, wreaking havoc on the entire United Kingdom. He's travelled across the pond (with canine sidekick Odie) to surprise his master, Jon Arbuckle, who is in London to propose to his girlfriend, veterinarian Liz Wilson. In the grand estate Garfield now calls home, he's receiving the royal treatment, including a butler and an international array of four-legged servants and followers. It's a life fit for a king... even though Garfield is only a prince; in fact, he's the real "Prince and the Paw-purr."(n)

programme.title: Franny's Feet
programme.desc: Slippery Sandcastle; Butter Fingers. Franny visits Jamaica, where she makes sand castles and learns about the tide. Later, she learns how to make butter during a trip back in time to the pioneer days(n)

programme.title: Connie the Cow
programme.sub-title: Patch Wants to Fly; Making Colours; The Day It Snowed in Springtime
programme.desc: Patch Wants to Fly; Making Colours; The Day It Snowed in Springtime. Connie teaches Dodger the cat not to play pranks; they learn that nature is always changing(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: The Treasure Hunt; Paddington Goes to Hollywood; Mr. Gruber's Mystery Tour
programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt; Paddington Goes to Hollywood; Mr. Gruber's Mystery Tour. Paddington decides to dig for buried treasure; Paddington gets to play "The Claw" in a big Hollywood movie; Mr. Gruber and Paddington embark on a mystery tour which takes them to a waxworks museum(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: Straight Outta Paris. During a visit to Paris, Salem transforms the Eiffel Tower into a boy---who then refuses to be turned back into a tower(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: Postmaster General Franklin. Sarah and James carry letters to New York because the British have been intercepting patriot mail. Meanwhile, Ben Franklin (voice of Walter Cronkite) is named Postmaster General on July 26, 1775. Voice of James: Chris Lundquist. Voice of Sarah: Reo Jones(n)

programme.title: Beethoven
programme.desc: A St. Bernard puppy 'adopts' a new home after escaping from dog thieves. The Newton family just haven't realised the trouble that 185 pounds of dog can get into...(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 2nd
programme.desc: Family comedy sequel reuniting the grown-up St Bernard dog Beethoven with his reluctant owner, George Newton, and George's family. Beethoven discovers love when he turns his attention to Missy, who belongs to the heartless Regina, and soon four puppies arrive in the world. While the little dogs cause havoc in the Newton household, Regina makes plans to steal them(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 3rd
programme.desc: Beethoven the Saint Bernard is back in this comedy for the whole family, in which the Newton Family (with their rather large pet in tow) hops into their camper for a cross-country vacation. Along the way, they encounter a gang of bad guys. Can Beethoven help bring them to justice? Beethoven's 3rd stars Judge Reinhold, Julia Sweeney, Jamie Marsh, and Michaela Gallo. Charles Grodin, star of the first two films, opted not to appear in this one(n)

programme.desc: Extreme mountain bikers are followed as they seek out some of the toughest trails in the world(n)

programme.desc: Beethoven, the lovably large St. Bernard, is back in the direct-to-video sequel Beethoven's 4th. Those who enjoyed the other films in this series will more than likely enjoy this entry(n)

programme.title: Franny's Feet
programme.desc: Picture This; Sound Advice. Franny learns about hieroglyphics in Egypt. Later, she visits Scotland, where she learns about bagpipes and how sound travels(n)

programme.sub-title: Who Do I Look Like; Playing With Stones; The Adventurous Ant
programme.desc: Who Do I Look Like; Playing With Stones; The Adventurous Ant. Connie discovers what different animals have in common(n)

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington Bear
programme.sub-title: A Disappearing Trick; Paddington Saves the Day; Paddington Goes to School
programme.desc: A Disappearing Trick; Paddington Saves the Day; Paddington Goes to School. Paddington's determined to give a magic show to entertain all the guests at his birthday party; Paddington tries his hand at the game of cricket; and due to bureaucratic bungling, Paddington receives notice that he should attend the local school(n)

programme.title: Sabrina, the Animated Series
programme.desc: Strange New World. Thomas Edison is transported into the present and alters history(n)

programme.title: Liberty's Kids
programme.desc: Common Sense. James and Sarah meet Thomas Paine (voice of Nils Haaland), who rallies the patriot cause in January 1776 with a stirring pamphlet. It particularly inspires James (Chris Lundquist) to pursue his journalistic ambitions. Voice of Franklin: Walter Cronkite(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's 5th
programme.desc: In this charming installment of the series, the mischievous canine digs up an old $10 bill, which turns out to be part of a missing fortune. Suddenly he's the most popular dog in town. Daveigh Chase, Dave Thomas, Sammy Kahn, Faith Ford, John Larroquette, Clint Howard, Katherine Helmond(n)

programme.title: Beethoven's Big Break
programme.desc: Eddie, a struggling animal trainer and single dad suddenly finds himself the personal wrangler for a large and lovable St. Bernard whose fabulous movie audition catapults the dog to stardom. programme.desc: The Incredible World of Horace Ford. Reginald Rose adapted the script for this Twilight Zone episode from his own 60-minute Studio One teleplay, which originally aired June 13, 1955. The earlier version starred Art Carney as Horace Ford, a middle-aged toy manufacturer with the temperament of a child. Forever yearning for the days of his idyllic childhood, Horace is at last able to relive his youth, only to find that things weren't quite as rosy as he remembered. programme.desc: The film that does what it says on the tin. Samuel L. Jackson plays Neville Flynn, an FBI agent escorting Sean Jones, witness to a gangland slaying, from Hawaii to Los Angeles. The film earned a reputation for the inclusion of plot by blogging fans, including one now infamous line, but despite the novel approach to its production, David Ellis's film is surprisingly well acted and tense, with Julianna Margulies as flight attendant Claire Miller and David Koechner as co-pilot Rick receiving a share of the cracking dialogue(n)

programme.title: American Dad!

So Stan fights back (literally, as it turns out)(n)

programme.title: American Dad!

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Three Kings. When Peter reads some of Stephen King's works, he imagines his family and friends in three of King's stories. Firstly, Peter, Quagmire, Cleveland and Joe act out Stand By Me, where as 12-year-olds they travel along a railroad track on a journey of self-discovery. Secondly, Peter's take on Misery puts an injured Brian being rescued by his fan, Stewie. Finally, Peter envisions his own version of the Shawshank Redemption, where he and Cleveland become friends in prison(n)

programme.title: Family Guy
programme.desc: Peter's Progress. "How I Met Your Mother" stars Jason Segel, Neil Patrick Harris and Josh Radnor have voice cameos as themselves(n)

programme.title: Friends

Monica is upset because everyone still congregates in her old place, in spite of her fresh-baked cookies and pornography(n)

programme.sub-title: The One with Joey's Dirty Day

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Race. After Jerry runs into an old acquaintance, a years-old foot-race between the two men becomes a subject of debate and they decide to run a rematch to settle it once and for all. Meanwhile, things are looking "red" for the rest of the gang when Elaine discovers that her new boyfriend is a communist, George is reprimanded by George Steinbrenner when it comes out that he'd answered a personal ad in a communist newspaper, and Kramer recites communist rhetoric while working as a department store Santa Claus. Todd Kimsey, Don McManus, and Vicki Lewis guest star and co-creator/writer Larry David appears uncredited as the voice of George Steinbrenner. Originally airing December 15, 1994, "The Race" was the 12th episode shot for the show's sixth season, despite being the tenth one shown(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Kiss Hello. Jerry becomes frustrated by over-the-top greetings while Kramer attempts to promote a sense of community in the apartment block(n)

programme.title: Seinfeld
programme.desc: The Beard. When Jerry claims to never have seen Melrose Place, his police-officer girlfriend decides to finger him as a liar by hooking him up to a polygraph machine. Meanwhile, Elaine formulates a plan to convince her gay, male friend to "switch teams" despite his familiarity with his team's equipment, George begins wearing a toupee only to be set up on a date with a bald woman, and Kramer gets a job as a police lineup stand-in. Jon Gries, Robert Mailhouse, and Katherine LaNasa guest star. Originally airing February 9, 1995, "The Beard" was the 15th episode of the show's sixth season(n)
